author: DMX
quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.

author: Marcel Proust
quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.

author: Omar Khayyam
quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.

author: William Inge
quote: The happiest people seem to be those who have no particular cause for being happy except that they are so.

author: Ileana D'Cruz
quote: Love yourself for who you are, and trust me, if you are happy from within, you are the most beautiful person, and your smile is your best asset.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.

author: Martha Washington
quote: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I may find myself. For I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstance but by our disposition.

author: Avril Lavigne
quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.

author: Socrates
quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

author: Gretchen Rubin
quote: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: If you want to be happy, be.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.

author: Franz Schubert
quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: Try and leave this world a little better than you found it, and when your turn comes to die, you can die happy in feeling that at any rate, you have not wasted your time but have done your best.

author: Dustin Poirier
quote: I need to celebrate life because I'm in a good spot, I work hard, and I am happy with who I am and happy with what I do for a living, and sometimes I just focus and overwhelm myself so much with the fights and getting better, that I just need to slow it down and enjoy life and enjoy training.

author: Groucho Marx
quote: I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn't arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?

author: Adam Smith
quote: No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable.

author: Manoj Bajpayee
quote: Struggle teaches you a lot of things, and I am happy that I witnessed a roller coaster ride. The journey has improved me as a person and made me more mature.

author: Dada Vaswani
quote: Happiness, true happiness, is an inner quality. It is a state of mind. If your mind is at peace, you are happy. If your mind is at peace, but you have nothing else, you can be happy. If you have everything the world can give - pleasure, possessions, power - but lack peace of mind, you can never be happy.

author: Orson Welles
quote: If you want a happy ending, that depends, of course, on where you stop your story.

author: J. Donald Walters
quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.

author: Golda Meir
quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.

author: Alice Walker
quote: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.

author: Anton Chekhov
quote: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.

author: Lilly Pulitzer
quote: Being happy never goes out of style.

author: Marilu Henner
quote: Being in control of your life and having realistic expectations about your day-to-day challenges are the keys to stress management, which is perhaps the most important ingredient to living a happy, healthy and rewarding life.

author: Doja Cat
quote: If your only intent is to be seen, you'll never be seen. If your intent is to be happy, comfortable, genuine, and true in craft, you're destined to be noticed.

author: Albert Camus
quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.

author: Christie Brinkley
quote: I believe in true love, and I believe in happy endings. And I believe.

author: Clint Eastwood
quote: There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again.

author: Ovid
quote: Happy are those who dare courageously to defend what they love.

author: Guillaume Apollinaire
quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.

author: Paul Walker
quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.

author: Philip Green
quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.

author: J. D. Salinger
quote: I am a kind of paranoid in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.

author: Tom Brady
quote: Too often in life, something happens and we blame other people for us not being happy or satisfied or fulfilled. So the point is, we all have choices, and we make the choice to accept people or situations or to not accept situations.

author: Will Arnett
quote: I am happy because I'm grateful. I choose to be grateful. That gratitude allows me to be happy.

author: Marc Newson
quote: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.

author: Immanuel Kant
quote: Morality is not the doctrine of how we may make ourselves happy, but how we may make ourselves worthy of happiness.

author: James Broughton
quote: I'm happy to report that my inner child is still ageless.

author: Ariana Grande
quote: Be happy with being you. Love your flaws. Own your quirks. And know that you are just as perfect as anyone else, exactly as you are.

author: Tena Desae
quote: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: The world is so full of a number of things, I'm sure we should all be as happy as kings.

author: Earl Nightingale
quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.

author: Julia Roberts
quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.

author: Rita Moreno
quote: Smell the roses. Smell the coffee. Whatever it is that makes you happy.

author: Kurt Cobain
quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.

author: Lee Radziwill
quote: I believe that without memories there is no life, and that our memories should be of happy times.

author: Jane Fonda
quote: It's never too late - never too late to start over, never too late to be happy.

author: Booth Tarkington
quote: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.

author: William James
quote: I don't sing because I'm happy; I'm happy because I sing.

author: Lil Yachty
quote: I am happy every day, because life is moving in a very positive way.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quote: If you truly get in touch with a piece of carrot, you get in touch with the soil, the rain, the sunshine. You get in touch with Mother Earth and eating in such a way, you feel in touch with true life, your roots, and that is meditation. If we chew every morsel of our food in that way we become grateful and when you are grateful, you are happy.

author: Maria Sharapova
quote: It's easy to impress me. I don't need a fancy party to be happy. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content.

author: Marcel Pagnol
quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve.

author: Elon Musk
quote: I will never be happy without having someone. Going to sleep alone kills me.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.

author: P. J. O'Rourke
quote: Liberals are always proposing perfectly insane ideas, laws that will make everybody happy, laws that will make everything right, make us live forever, and all be rich. Conservatives are never that stupid.

author: Timothee Chalamet
quote: We're only here for so long. Be happy, man. You could get hit by a truck tomorrow.

author: Irina Shayk
quote: What I've never understood is why some women use plastic surgery to make themselves more attractive to men. The most beautiful woman is someone who's happy and is always smiling.

author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
quote: Football is my sanctuary. It's where I go to escape. It's where I'm most happy.

author: William E. Gladstone
quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.

author: Kiana Tom
quote: My personal goals are to be happy, healthy and to be surrounded by loved ones.

author: Jo Brand
quote: Even nice things don't make you happy when you're tired.

author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
quote: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing.

author: Henny Youngman
quote: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.

author: Gretchen Bleiler
quote: Life is short, and if we enjoy every moment of every day, then we will be happy no matter what happens or what changes along the way.

author: Khris Middleton
quote: Nobody's perfect, so don't go out there and try to act like you got to live a perfect life. Be yourself, and be happy with it.

author: Andre Maurois
quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.

author: Elsa Schiaparelli
quote: Eating is not merely a material pleasure. Eating well gives a spectacular joy to life and contributes immensely to goodwill and happy companionship. It is of great importance to the morale.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: A man can be happy with any woman, as long as he does not love her.

author: Kristin Chenoweth
quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife and I were happy for 20 years. Then we met.

author: Maluma
quote: I am very happy and honored to be part of the Sony ATV family.

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.

author: Lionel Messi
quote: There's nothing more satisfying than seeing a happy and smiling child. I always help in any way I can, even if it's just by signing an autograph. A child's smile is worth more than all the money in the world.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: There is no lonelier man in death, except the suicide, than that man who has lived many years with a good wife and then outlived her. If two people love each other there can be no happy end to it.

author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum
quote: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.

author: W. Somerset Maugham
quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.

author: Park Shin-hye
quote: Less make-up is better, and it's always better to let your natural beauty shine. Essentially, be happy with your appearance.

author: Muhammad Yunus
quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.

author: H. L. Mencken
quote: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy.

author: Deepika Padukone
quote: I am someone who can't hold on to negativity or hold on to grudges. I might feel something at a certain point, but I get tired after that. I don't carry it with me. I forgive and forget very easily, and that's the only way to be happy and peaceful.

author: Jack Ma
quote: When I am myself, I am happy and have a good result.

author: Chelsea Leyland
quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: To be happy at home is the ultimate result of all ambition, the end to which every enterprise and labor tends, and of which every desire prompts the prosecution.

author: Abhishek Bachchan
quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.

author: Randhir Kapoor
quote: I like my peace. I am happy in my space.

author: Henri Rousseau
quote: Nothing makes me so happy as to observe nature and to paint what I see.

author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
quote: Learning lessons is a little like reaching maturity. You're not suddenly more happy, wealthy, or powerful, but you understand the world around you better, and you're at peace with yourself. Learning life's lessons is not about making your life perfect, but about seeing life as it was meant to be.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.

author: Spike Milligan
quote: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.

author: Alicia Keys
quote: Simplicity makes me happy.

author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
quote: Be happy. It's one way of being wise.

author: Demi Lovato
quote: I don't let anyone's insecurities, emotions, or opinions bother me. I know that if I am happy, that's all that matters to me.

author: Zoe Saldana
quote: Happiness is nothing but temporary moments here and there - and I love those. But I would be bored out of my mind if I were happy all the time.

author: Herbert Spencer
quote: No one can be perfectly free till all are free; no one can be perfectly moral till all are moral; no one can be perfectly happy till all are happy.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
quote: When someone does something good, applaud! You will make two people happy.

author: Christina Milian
quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.

author: Barbara De Angelis
quote: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.

author: John Lewis
quote: Not one of us can rest, be happy, be at home, be at peace with ourselves, until we end hatred and division.

author: James Sinegal
quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.

author: Chaim Potok
quote: Come, let us have some tea and continue to talk about happy things.

author: Zoe Kravitz
quote: I'm happy to just sit in a cafe and watch people. It's my favorite thing to do, for sure.

author: John Locke
quote: A sound mind in a sound body, is a short, but full description of a happy state in this World: he that has these two, has little more to wish for; and he that wants either of them, will be little the better for anything else.

author: Steven Wright
quote: I remember when the candle shop burned down. Everyone stood around singing 'Happy Birthday.'

author: Poppy
quote: My mission is to make the world happy and cute and to love everyone. I think I'm doing a pretty good job.

author: Gerald Jampolsky
quote: You can be right or you can be happy.

author: David Goggins
quote: The only way you gain mental toughness is to do things you're not happy doing. If you continue doing things that you're satisfied and make you happy, you're not getting stronger. You're staying where you're at. Either you're getting better, or you're getting worse. You're not staying the same.

author: Montesquieu
quote: If we only wanted to be happy, it would be easy; but we want to be happier than other people, and that is almost always difficult, since we think them happier than they are.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: My ultimate goal is to end up being happy. Most of the time.

author: Tyler, The Creator
quote: I don't like people around me sad. I like making people happy.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: The palace is not safe when the cottage is not happy.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: People are basically the same the world over. Everybody wants the same things - to be happy, to be healthy, to be at least reasonably prosperous, and to be secure. They want friends, peace of mind, good family relationships, and hope that tomorrow is going to be even better than today.

author: Julia Child
quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: I know I will never be happy, but I know I can be gay!

author: Thomas Paine
quote: I believe in the equality of man; and I believe that religious duties consist in doing justice, loving mercy, and endeavoring to make our fellow-creatures happy.

author: Calum Scott
quote: Just celebrate who you are and be happy with you are. Take all the ups and downs together, as you're only human.

author: Franz Kafka
quote: Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.

author: Paul Mooney
quote: If your hair is relaxed, white people are relaxed. If your hair is nappy, they're not happy.

author: Michael Jackson
quote: I'm happy to be alive, I'm happy to be who I am.

author: Jessica Lange
quote: I regret those times when I've chosen the dark side. I've wasted enough time not being happy.

author: Eric Idle
quote: I have been very blessed in my life and rewarded with good friends and good health. I am grateful and happy to be able to share this.

author: Michael Leunig
quote: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that.

author: Lawrence G. Lovasik
quote: Try to make at least one person happy every day. If you cannot do a kind deed, speak a kind word. If you cannot speak a kind word, think a kind thought. Count up, if you can, the treasure of happiness that you would dispense in a week, in a year, in a lifetime!

author: Epicurus
quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.

author: Mary Shelley
quote: And now, once again, I bid my hideous progeny go forth and prosper. I have an affection for it, for it was the offspring of happy days, when death and grief were but words, which found no true echo in my heart.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: I am happy being what I am.

author: Bob Ross
quote: There are no mistakes, only happy accidents.

author: Anne Hathaway
quote: I gave up my struggle with perfection a long time ago. That is a concept I don't find very interesting anymore. Everyone just wants to look good in the photographs. I think that is where some of the pressure comes from. Be happy. Be yourself, the day is about a lot more.

author: Lyndon B. Johnson
quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.

author: A. A. Milne
quote: The third-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the majority. The second-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the minority. The first-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking.

author: Vidya Balan
quote: Life has been kind to me. I am happy with the love and appreciation that I have been getting throughout my career. I feel blessed.

author: Kylian Mbappe
quote: I am happy, and I am living the life I always dreamed of.

author: Christian Nestell Bovee
quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.

author: Walter Payton
quote: I am happy to say that everyone that I have met in my life, I have gained something from them; be it negative or positive, it has enforced and reinforced my life in some aspect.

author: Warren Buffett
quote: Only buy something that you'd be perfectly happy to hold if the market shut down for 10 years.

author: John Ruskin
quote: In order that people may be happy in their work, these three things are needed: They must be fit for it. They must not do too much of it. And they must have a sense of success in it.

author: Princess Diana
quote: I think the biggest disease the world suffers from in this day and age is the disease of people feeling unloved. I know that I can give love for a minute, for half an hour, for a day, for a month, but I can give. I am very happy to do that, I want to do that.

author: Richard Branson
quote: Too many people measure how successful they are by how much money they make or the people that they associate with. In my opinion, true success should be measured by how happy you are.

author: Kim Kardashian
quote: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.

author: Lzzy Hale
quote: You can't please everyone. There's always going to be someone disappointed, so you might as well make yourself happy and Be You.

author: Katy Perry
quote: I'm happy, I'm in a good place, I'm looking forward to my future.

author: Tom Bodett
quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.

author: George Orwell
quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness.

author: Hugh Downs
quote: A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.

author: Oliver Tambo
quote: The fight for freedom must go on until it is won; until our country is free and happy and peaceful as part of the community of man, we cannot rest.

author: Zendaya
quote: Find something that makes you happy and go for it.

author: Karen Civil
quote: Everything is a learning lesson, good and bad, so I am happy with the way things are, and I learned from everything negative. I am in a great space now, so I wouldn't change a thing!

author: Voltaire
quote: Use, do not abuse... neither abstinence nor excess ever renders man happy.

author: Felipe Massa
quote: I am happy to start from zero, to create, to restart.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: Perhaps it's good for one to suffer. Can an artist do anything if he's happy? Would he ever want to do anything? What is art, after all, but a protest against the horrible inclemency of life?

author: Ted Turner
quote: To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless.

author: Sulli
quote: My life is actually empty, so I feel like I'm lying to everyone by pretending to be happy on the outside.

author: Mark Victor Hansen
quote: Dedicate yourself to the good you deserve and desire for yourself. Give yourself peace of mind. You deserve to be happy. You deserve delight.

author: Reba McEntire
quote: I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved.

author: Lil Durk
quote: I'm happy with the person I become.

author: Madison Beer
quote: People say I'm too skinny, but if I gain a little weight, they say I look chubby. You can't please everyone. As long as you're happy, that's all that matters.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.

author: Troy Polamalu
quote: There are times I am happy. There are times I am sad. But I always try to separate emotion from the need to reach for something stronger, deeper. And then no matter the emotion, I can reach for a stability that helps me accomplish what is the goal.

author: Agatha Christie
quote: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: I'm happy being myself, which I've never been before. I always hid in other people, or tried to find myself through the characters, or live out their lives, but I didn't have those things in mine.

author: Sridevi
quote: What you feel inside reflects on your face. So be happy and positive all the time.

author: Edward Gibbon
quote: But the power of instruction is seldom of much efficacy, except in those happy dispositions where it is almost superfluous.

author: Nicola Roberts
quote: I think if you're happy and you're a nice person and you have a nice personality that always shines through.

author: Rene Girard
quote: We are aware that globalization doesn't mean global friendship but global competition and, therefore, conflict. That doesn't mean we will all destroy each other, but it is no happy global village, either.

author: Sonam Kapoor
quote: I feel I am lucky. I am grateful for this life that God has given me. I am happy, as I am getting to do work that I want to do and enjoy doing it.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: If our condition were truly happy, we would not seek diversion from it in order to make ourselves happy.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.

author: Yanni
quote: A simple life is good with me. I don't need a whole lot. For me, a T-shirt, a pair of shorts, barefoot on a beach and I'm happy.

author: Marco Pierre White
quote: I think self-discovery is the greatest achievement in life, because once you discover yourself and accept what you are, then you can fulfil your true potential and be happy.

author: Ben Shapiro
quote: Socialism violates at least three of the Ten Commandments: It turns government into God, it legalizes thievery and it elevates covetousness. Discussions of income inequality, after all, aren't about prosperity but about petty spite. Why should you care how much money I make, so long as you are happy?

author: John Kennedy
quote: Beto's copy of the Bill of Rights goes from one to three. Mine includes the Second Amendment. But there are a whole host of people here in Washington... they would be happy to confiscate America's guns. And if you don't believe that, then you probably also still believe in Bigfoot.

author: Robert Anthony
quote: Most people would rather be certain they're miserable, than risk being happy.

author: James D'arcy
quote: There are lots of people I admire and respect, but I don't necessarily want to be like them. I'm too happy being myself.

author: Paul Bloom
quote: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.

author: Britney Spears
quote: For me, success is a state of mind. I feel like success isn't about conquering something; it's being happy with who you are.

author: Paula Cole
quote: I think it's important to find the little things in everyday life that make you happy.

author: Valerie Bertinelli
quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.

author: Nick Vujicic
quote: Often people ask how I manage to be happy despite having no arms and no legs. The quick answer is that I have a choice. I can be angry about not having limbs, or I can be thankful that I have a purpose. I chose gratitude.

author: Christopher McCandless
quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!

author: Maria Montessori
quote: The child who concentrates is immensely happy.

author: Mike Tyson
quote: I'm just happy I'm not a phony.

author: Johnny Carson
quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.

author: Leslie Caron
quote: In order to have great happiness you have to have great pain and unhappiness - otherwise how would you know when you're happy?

author: Aesop
quote: He that is discontented in one place will seldom be happy in another.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: If someone decides they're not going to be happy, it's not your problem. You don't have to spend your time and energy trying to cheer up someone who has already decided to stay in a bad mood. Believe it or not, you can actually hurt people by playing into their self-pity.

author: Stephen King
quote: And in real life endings aren't always neat, whether they're happy endings, or whether they're sad endings.

author: Robin Wright
quote: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.

author: Heidi Klum
quote: I am generally a very happy and easygoing person. I also believe it's always better to meet people with a smile rather than looking cold, especially when you first meet. It changes everything.

author: Elin Hilderbrand
quote: I have long maintained that each of us has three chances a day to be happy: Breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

author: Barun Sobti
quote: I am pretty happy with myself. I am not saying I am flawless, but I am content with the way I am.

author: Chanakya
quote: He who is overly attached to his family members experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.

author: Jaden Smith
quote: It's good to be happy and tell us how cool your life is and how awesome you are on social media. That's great because it inspires other people to be happy, too. But a lot of times, people are trying to be happy in the wrong ways - with money or with different things that are not true happiness.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: I have no faith in human perfectability. I think that human exertion will have no appreciable effect upon humanity. Man is now only more active - not more happy - nor more wise, than he was 6000 years ago.

author: Paul Rudd
quote: Looking back, I'm really happy with the choices I've made in my career. I know for a fact I could be wealthier. Who knows, maybe I could be more successful, maybe not. I don't know. But just about every single thing I've ever done I've gone into with the right intentions, and that goes a long way.

author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
quote: I always put myself second - I like to make others happy.

author: Ranveer Brar
quote: If you're a happy person around food, you can be a professional chef. It's fueled by passion.

author: Rihanna
quote: When I see myself as an old woman, I just think about being happy. And hopefully, I'll still be fly.

author: Chelsea Handler
quote: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life.

author: Tracy Kidder
quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.

author: Tom Watson
quote: I'm very happy with my life. I am what I am. I don't worry about anything that I can't control. That's a really good lesson in life.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: You can be happy where you are.

author: Solon
quote: Call no man happy until he is dead, but only lucky.

author: William Blake
quote: I have no name: I am but two days old. What shall I call thee? I happy am, Joy is my name. Sweet joy befall thee!

author: James Madison
quote: The happy Union of these States is a wonder; their Constitution a miracle; their example the hope of Liberty throughout the world.

author: Henri Poincare
quote: It is the harmony of the diverse parts, their symmetry, their happy balance; in a word it is all that introduces order, all that gives unity, that permits us to see clearly and to comprehend at once both the ensemble and the details.

author: Johnny Knoxville
quote: I'm lucky enough to be with someone, and I am happy.

author: Carolyn Haywood
quote: Children are not only innocent and curious but also optimistic and joyful and essentially happy. They are, in short, everything adults wish they could be.

author: Erich Fromm
quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.

author: Michael Morpurgo
quote: Wherever my story takes me, however dark and difficult the theme, there is always some hope and redemption, not because readers like happy endings, but because I am an optimist at heart. I know the sun will rise in the morning, that there is a light at the end of every tunnel.

author: Charles Leclerc
quote: Being honest with myself is something I like. I am happy that I don't make excuses when I make a mistake. This is a good way to improve in the fastest way.

author: Saint Teresa of Avila
quote: I was living an extremely burdensome life, because every time I prayed, I became more clearly aware of my faults. On the one hand, God was calling me. On the other, I was following the way of the world. Doing what God wanted made me happy; but I felt bound by the things of this world.

author: Novak Djokovic
quote: I'm a happy man, because I am successful in what I do, of course; but what makes me most happy is I have people around me that I love and who love me back. This, for me, is the most important thing. Nobody likes to be alone.

author: Suzanne Weyn
quote: Perfect happiness would be knowing that all my family and friends were happy and safe. Then I'd go to a tropical island with my husband where it was gorgeous and fun all day long and interesting and fun all evening. Good food and dancing would be nice, too, and weekly visits from those safe and happy family and friends. Plus world peace.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: In the confusion we stay with each other, happy to be together, speaking without uttering a single word.

author: Ogden Nash
quote: Children aren't happy with nothing to ignore, and that's what parents were created for.

author: Heart Evangelista
quote: Happy Skin is all about natural beauty. They don't want you to wear something that's harsh on your skin and I want that as well.

author: Aretha Franklin
quote: Being a singer is a natural gift. It means I'm using to the highest degree possible the gift that God gave me to use. I'm happy with that.

author: Cat Zingano
quote: Nothing always stays the same. You don't stay happy forever. You don't stay sad forever.

author: Troian Bellisario
quote: Seeing my friends succeed, find love, or just feeling content makes me feel unconditionally happy.

author: Tiffany Darwish
quote: If it's going to make you happy, go for it - life is short.

author: William Morris
quote: We shall not be happy unless we live like good animals, unless we enjoy the exercise of the ordinary functions of life: eating, sleeping, loving, walking, running, swimming, riding, sailing.

author: Lynda Resnick
quote: When you wake up each morning, you can choose to be happy or choose to be sad. Unless some terrible catastrophe has occurred the night before, it is pretty much up to you. Tomorrow morning, when the sun shines through your window, choose to make it a happy day.

author: Rafael Nadal
quote: The glory is being happy. The glory is not winning here or winning there. The glory is enjoying practicing, enjoy every day, enjoying to work hard, trying to be a better player than before.

author: Sheena Iyengar
quote: As we get older, we get better at choosing in ways that will make us happy. We do a better job at picking activities that make us happy, and at spending time with people who make us happy. We're also better at letting things go.

author: Sebastian Vettel
quote: There are some things that you can fulfil with money, but at the end of the day these are not the things that make you happy. It is the small things that make life good.

author: Johnny Weir
quote: I don't take on a project unless I know the end result is going to make me happy. If I can't give 100 percent to something, I choose not to do it because it's very difficult to have so many pots on the fire at one time.

author: Sharon Draper
quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.

author: 21 Savage
quote: I don't care about what nobody say or how nobody feel. I'm happy, I'm living my life, and that's what it is.

author: Woody Allen
quote: The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have, instead of what you don't have.

author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
quote: All my life, I have been a positive thinker... I have always been able to survive by telling myself that no matter how bad things are, they will one day be better. And that out of every event - no matter how tragic - one can always find a way to survive and even, perhaps, to be a little bit happy.

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: I think that being happy makes the biggest impact on your physical appearance.

author: Dan Quayle
quote: You all look like happy campers to me. Happy campers you are, happy campers you have been, and, as far as I am concerned, happy campers you will always be.

author: James Buchanan
quote: If you are as happy in entering the White House as I shall feel on returning to Wheatland, you are a happy man indeed.

author: Deepak Chopra
quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.

author: Richard Rohr
quote: The theological virtue of hope is the patient and trustful willingness to live without closure, without resolution, and still be content and even happy because our Satisfaction is now at another level, and our Source is beyond ourselves.

author: Paloma Elsesser
quote: I'm happy to sparkle like a glazed disco ball.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: People say I look so happy - and I say, 'That's the Botox.'

author: Saint Augustine
quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible.

author: Robert Green Ingersoll
quote: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.

author: Charles M. Schulz
quote: My life has no purpose, no direction, no aim, no meaning, and yet I'm happy. I can't figure it out. What am I doing right?

author: Victoria Principal
quote: Success doesn't mean that you are healthy, success doesn't mean that you're happy, success doesn't mean that you're rested. Success really doesn't mean that you look good, or feel good, or are good.

author: Shirley Ballas
quote: I've discovered if you have a small circle of people you know you can rely on - in good times, bad times, happy times, sad times - who aren't going to judge you and will, sometimes, just sit and listen to you without saying anything, then I think you're very fortunate.

author: Ken Hensley
quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!

author: Babar Azam
quote: I don't get happy with personal milestones. I get happy when my team wins.

author: Indira Gandhi
quote: Happiness is a state of mind, you know. I don't think you are permanently happy. One is happy about certain things and not so happy about others.

author: Logic
quote: Just because you got money doesn't mean you're gonna be happy, and just 'cuz you can buy everything in the world doesn't mean you're gonna find your purpose.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: You can never get enough of what you don't need to make you happy.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Just try to be happy. Unhappiness starts with wanting to be happier.

author: David Attenborough
quote: The question is, are we happy to suppose that our grandchildren may never be able to see an elephant except in a picture book?

author: P. T. Barnum
quote: To me there is no picture so beautiful as smiling, bright-eyed, happy children; no music so sweet as their clear and ringing laughter.

author: Jennie
quote: I would like to say every moment counts for you, so make the time that you spend for your dreams a very special moment, make sure that you do something that you'll be happy with when you go back and look at yourself.

author: Alexandra Stoddard
quote: Happiness is the first principle of life. Happiness basically means well-being. It is always good and always a choice... We need to make the choice to be happy in a particular situation, just as it is, and at a given moment.

author: Hero Fiennes-Tiffin
quote: If you're good, you'll get work. And if I've got food in my fridge and clothes on my back, I'll be happy.

author: Buzz Osborne
quote: Stupidity knows no bounds and certainly no city limits, but by and large, 99 percent of the people who come to Melvins shows seem to be relatively well behaved... I'm happy and relieved by this.

author: Swami Sivananda
quote: Desire nothing, give up all desires and be happy.

author: Amy Winehouse
quote: If I died tomorrow, I would be a happy girl.

author: Friedrich Schiller
quote: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.

author: Janet Fitch
quote: A lot of people think they should be happy all the time. But the writer understands you need both. You need the whole piano: the richness of the whole human experience. Depression, suffering and anger are all part of being human.

author: Goldie Hawn
quote: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are, and not who people think you are.

author: Juhi Chawla
quote: There is an amazing power getting to know your inner self and learning how to use it and not fight with the world. If you know what makes you happy, your personality, interests and capabilities, just use them, and everything else flows beautifully.

author: Ma Long
quote: I'm extremely happy that I could win the gold medal. It's a special moment in my career.

author: Patsy Kensit
quote: I am a happy person and I choose to be a positive person. I think some people think my life has been tragic and there have been these horrible dramas but things really have been, and are, fine.

author: Bianca Balti
quote: My definition of beauty is happiness. I believe that when you are happy, it shines through and makes you a more attractive and beautiful person!

author: Bruce Forsyth
quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.

author: Charlotte Kasl
quote: A life-long blessing for children is to fill them with warm memories of times together. Happy memories become treasures in the heart to pull out on the tough days of adulthood.

author: Andy Warhol
quote: I'm the type who'd be happy not going anywhere as long as I was sure I knew exactly what was happening at the places I wasn't going to. I'm the type who'd like to sit home and watch every party that I'm invited to on a monitor in my bedroom.

author: Helen Rowland
quote: To be happy with a man you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.

author: James Monroe
quote: If we look to the history of other nations, ancient or modern, we find no example of a growth so rapid, so gigantic, of a people so prosperous and happy.

author: Katherine Jenkins
quote: When I dance, I forget everything else and just feel completely happy.

author: Olivia Newton-John
quote: You never know what the future holds, so I am just enjoying being happy, healthy, and having my wonderful husband by my side.

author: Herb Kelleher
quote: Your employees come first. And if you treat your employees right, guess what? Your customers come back, and that makes your shareholders happy. Start with employees and the rest follows from that.

author: Walter Savage Landor
quote: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier.

author: George Clooney
quote: I don't believe in happy endings, but I do believe in happy travels, because ultimately, you die at a very young age, or you live long enough to watch your friends die. It's a mean thing, life.

author: Roger Ebert
quote: To make others less happy is a crime. To make ourselves unhappy is where all crime starts. We must try to contribute joy to the world. That is true no matter what our problems, our health, our circumstances. We must try. I didn't always know this, and am happy I lived long enough to find it out.

author: Rebecca Wells
quote: Flowers heal me. Tulips make me happy. I keep myself surrounded by them as soon as they start coming to the island from Canada, and after that when they come from the fields in La Connor, not far from where I live.

author: Robert Herrick
quote: It takes great wit and interest and energy to be happy. The pursuit of happiness is a great activity. One must be open and alive. It is the greatest feat man has to accomplish.

author: Brooke Shields
quote: Don't waste a minute not being happy. If one window closes, run to the next window- or break down a door.

author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
quote: The most happy marriage I can picture or imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman.

author: Coretta Scott King
quote: I'm fulfilled in what I do. I never thought that a lot of money or fine clothes - the finer things of life - would make you happy. My concept of happiness is to be filled in a spiritual sense.

author: David Lynch
quote: Happy accidents are real gifts, and they can open the door to a future that didn't even exist. It's kind of nice sometimes to set up something to encourage or allow happy accidents to happen.

author: Roy Ayers
quote: I don't trip on that much. I just like to enjoy life and be happy.

author: Marshall McLuhan
quote: Politics will eventually be replaced by imagery. The politician will be only too happy to abdicate in favor of his image, because the image will be much more powerful than he could ever be.

author: Sean O'Casey
quote: Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves.

author: Kinky Friedman
quote: A happy childhood... is the worst possible preparation for life.

author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quote: People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.

author: Sandra Bullock
quote: I think most of us are raised with preconceived notions of the choices we're supposed to make. We waste so much time making decisions based on someone else's idea of our happiness - what will make you a good citizen or a good wife or daughter or actress. Nobody says, 'Just be happy - go be a cobbler or go live with goats.'

author: Ellen DeGeneres
quote: We focus so much on our differences, and that is creating, I think, a lot of chaos and negativity and bullying in the world. And I think if everybody focused on what we all have in common - which is - we all want to be happy.

author: Joyce Giraud
quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.

author: Lillie Langtry
quote: Anyone's life truly lived consists of work, sunshine, exercise, soap, plenty of fresh air, and a happy contented spirit.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
quote: I'm proud to play for Real Madrid because I have fun; when you no longer have fun it's a sign that it's time to leave. For now though, I'm happy here at the greatest club in the world.

author: Corbin Bleu
quote: I'm a very outgoing person. I'm always happy, I'm one of those people who are always smiling. If somebody described me to somebody else, they'd say the kid with the curly hair with the big smile on his face. I get along with everybody.

author: RM
quote: They say people live to be happy. If you actually think about what happiness is, it's nothing much. When you get to eat ramen after feeling really, really hungry, that's happiness.

author: Lillian Gish
quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.

author: Mickey Rooney
quote: All I want is to live a peaceful life, to regain my life and be happy.

author: Steve Harvey
quote: When you're happy at home, you can make a lot of things happen.

author: Paul Klee
quote: Color possesses me. I don't have to pursue it. It will possess me always, I know it. That is the meaning of this happy hour: Color and I are one. I am a painter.

author: Joan Kirner
quote: I was very happy being education minister and deputy to John Cain.

author: John Dryden
quote: Happy the man, and happy he alone, he who can call today his own; he who, secure within, can say, tomorrow do thy worst, for I have lived today.

author: Caroline Rhea
quote: Don't compare yourself with someone else's version of happy or thin. Accepting yourself burns the most calories.

author: Shweta Basu Prasad
quote: Human mind has way too many shades. It would be so boring if this world was all sugar and gloss, just happy, colourful lives. People singing songs is not always the reality. Just like happiness and love, people also feel wrath, jealousy and vengeance!

author: Rita Wilson
quote: Performing live actually thrills me. Just get me a stage, get me a mic, and I'm going to be happy.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: Most people are happy being average. Most are happy being faceless in a sea of faces.

author: Nico Mirallegro
quote: I'm definitely a morning person. I wake up dead happy, looking forward to having my cereal!

author: Ann Landers
quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset.

author: Jon Favreau
quote: I like happy endings in movies. I think life has a happy ending. When it's all said and done, it's all something worthwhile, and I want my movies to reflect that. There are enough things to be sad about. When you pop in a movie, let the message be one that's one of hope.

author: Lamar Jackson
quote: Be happy. God gave you a breath to breathe every day. You don't need to be mad about nothin'.

author: Liz Phair
quote: I'm really happy to be a mom, and I'm proud of the phase I'm in.

author: Tiesto
quote: Trance is a very emotional and uplifting form of dance music. It appeals to many people in this way having such a strong connection with emotions. It makes people happy and ready to party.

author: Vikrant Massey
quote: It feels really grateful, thankful, and happy when your work is appreciated.

author: Arjun Kapoor
quote: Every morning when I wake up, I am grateful and happy that I come to the film set. It is home.

author: Tina Fey
quote: Being a mom has made me so tired. And so happy.

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
quote: Acting is happy agony.

author: Ella Woodward
quote: The most important thing is to snack on things that are filled with real food and nourishing ingredients that will leave you feeling energised and happy.

author: Mitski
quote: I don't think I'm alone in this: I'm obsessed with trying to not only be happy but maintain happiness, but my definition of happiness is skewed more towards ecstasy rather than contentment.

author: Ally Sheedy
quote: My experiences have taught me a lot and I'm happy with my learnings, if not with what I went through to learn.

author: Aristotle
quote: For one swallow does not make a summer, nor does one day; and so too one day, or a short time, does not make a man blessed and happy.

author: Kim Jong-un
quote: Construction is an important front for solidifying the foundations of a thriving country and creating bases for the people's happy life.

author: Alexander Pope
quote: Happy the man whose wish and care a few paternal acres bound, content to breathe his native air in his own ground.

author: Lucille Ball
quote: It's a helluva start, being able to recognize what makes you happy.

author: Edith Wharton
quote: If only we'd stop trying to be happy we'd have a pretty good time.

author: Hesiod
quote: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth.

author: Dennis Prager
quote: Of all the characteristics needed for both a happy and morally decent life, none surpasses gratitude. Grateful people are happier, and grateful people are more morally decent.

author: Suze Orman
quote: Happiness is not a luxury. It is a necessity. When we are happy, we are in the best possible place to be good to ourselves and those we love.

author: Fran Lebowitz
quote: As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.

author: Ayesha Curry
quote: My happy place is my bedroom. I love it.

author: Marcus Luttrell
quote: I spend most of my time at the ranch with my family, and enjoy life - watch the sun come up, watch it go down, thank God for another day, and just be happy.

author: P. G. Wodehouse
quote: Flowers are happy things.

author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark
quote: I am happy to continue with my journey through time.

author: James Blunt
quote: I am very happy to say I look just like my dad. But mothers always think their children are prettier than they really are, and mine has always told me I look like Tom Cruise.

author: Orson Bean
quote: Being happy is a revolutionary act; I think it spreads, like ripples in a pond.

author: Laila Rouass
quote: I was brought up a Muslim and I respect the religion I was born into, but I don't practise it. However, I do believe in thanking God for my happy life.

author: Kate Winslet
quote: By nature, I'm a very positive person, and because I'm happy in myself, and in my life, and I've got a great husband, and beautiful children, and I have a job that I love that calls for a certain amount of emotional expression, I get to realise a lot of my dreams and aspirations.

author: Dexter Darden
quote: I love to see people laugh and put a smile on peoples' faces. Anytime I'm doing that I'm happy.

author: Edmund Spenser
quote: It is the mind that maketh good of ill, that maketh wretch or happy, rich or poor.

author: Mary Oliver
quote: We all have a hungry heart, and one of the things we hunger for is happiness. So as much as I possibly could, I stayed where I was happy.

author: Chris Rock
quote: Only married people understand you can be miserable and happy at the same time.

author: Cupcakke
quote: I don't have kids, but in the future, if I ever do, I would want my child to be happy no matter what: gay, lesbian, bi - whatever. To see a smile on my child's face would be the only thing that would matter and keep my blood pumping.

author: David Geffen
quote: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.

author: Harshvardhan Rane
quote: There is never going to be an end point. But definitely, I am happy to complete a certain part of my journey, and that's something I want to celebrate.

author: Janet Jackson
quote: I am the baby in the family, and I always will be. I am actually very happy to have that position. But I still get teased. I don't mind that.

author: Aimee Bender
quote: I like birthday cake. It's so symbolic. It's a tempting symbol to load with something more complicated than just 'Happy birthday!' because it's this emblem of childhood and a happy day.

author: Idina Menzel
quote: I can sing 'Happy Birthday' to you in twelve different places, but one of them is going to make you feel a certain thing, maybe it's a vulnerability, maybe an innocence, maybe another way is sexy and soulful or bluesy whatever it is, but with singers, exploring keys, I think, is important.

author: Ana Ivanovic
quote: Everyone wants to be happy - people find happiness in different ways. While you want to pursue your career 100 percent, I think it is very hard to give 100 percent in something else. It's important to find this balance, and priorities change throughout life.

author: Katelyn Ohashi
quote: It's not me standing on the podium with medals. It's me being able to walk out with a smile on my face and truly being happy with myself.

author: Maeve Binchy
quote: Happiness is in our own hearts. I have no regrets of anything in the past. I'm totally cheerful and happy, and I think that a lot of your attitude is not in the circumstances you find yourself in, but in the circumstances you make for yourself.

author: Rohini Nilekani
quote: As citizens, we have to co-create good governance, we cannot outsource it and hope to be passively happy consumers. Like everything worth its while, good governance must be earned.

author: Stella Maxwell
quote: Wellness is associated with happiness. When you're happy, you're feeling good in your mind and body. That ties into being healthy, eating well, and exercising regularly. It also ties into being excited about things - like getting up in the morning and having a healthy breakfast.

author: Isabel Allende
quote: I never said I wanted a 'happy' life but an interesting one. From separation and loss, I have learned a lot. I have become strong and resilient, as is the case of almost every human being exposed to life and to the world. We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward.

author: Emiliano Martinez
quote: When you work hard, you are not going to be happy the whole time, you are going to have frustration, bad times in life.

author: Dayananda Saraswati
quote: He is good and wise who always speaks the truth, acts on the dictates of virtue, and tries to make others good and happy.

author: Amruta Khanvilkar
quote: I am closest to my mother, as she is my rock, my pillar of strength, and my world. Not only has she stood by me through all times - happy, sad, and otherwise - but there have even been moments when I had completely lost hope, and her immense belief in me had lifted me up.

author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah
quote: If we want to make this great State of Pakistan happy and prosperous, we should wholly and solely concentrate on the well-being of the people, and especially of the masses and the poor.

author: David Hepworth
quote: Others may recognise their world in 'Eat Sleep Work Repeat'. This podcast is the side project of Bruce Daisley, who works at Twitter. It consists of him talking to experts about what makes us happy at work and why.

author: Ernie Banks
quote: You must try to generate happiness within yourself. If you aren't happy in one place, chances are you won't be happy anyplace.

author: Bipasha Basu
quote: I want to tell women that you need to love yourself and make yourself a priority. It's only when you are happy yourself, can you make everyone else around you happy. I am still a dreamer and still believe in fairy tales, but there is only that much one should give another person. You need to keep something for yourself.

author: Sophia Bush
quote: To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there.

author: Anne Ford
quote: Learning disabilities cannot be cured, but they can be treated successfully and children with LD can go on to live happy, successful lives.

author: Normani Kordei
quote: There's always room for growth. I feel like I'll never get to the point where I'm 100 percent happy with where I am with my career.

author: Gennady Golovkin
quote: I am very positive. I like to box. I like my life. I am happy every day.

author: Amanda Hale
quote: My dad came over from Ireland when he was 13 and lived on the streets, working on building sites, and has just retired from his job delivering furniture for John Lewis. My mum has had the same job for 30 years as a sales assistant at Marks and Spencer. They've always been really great; they just want me to be happy.

author: Arnold H. Glasow
quote: Happy is the person who knows what to remember of the past, what to enjoy in the present, and what to plan for in the future.

author: Astro
quote: I don't have a desire for material things. As long as I'm happy, I'm good, man.

author: John James Audubon
quote: Surrounded by all the members of my dear family, enjoying the affection of numerous friends, who have never abandoned me, and possessing a sufficient share of all that contributes to make life agreeable, I lift my grateful eyes towards the Supreme Being and feel that I am happy.

author: Jose Jose
quote: Life prepares you so that you are able to create your own happy ending.

author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.

author: David Walliams
quote: I had a very happy childhood, but I wasn't that happy a child. I liked being alone and creating characters and voices. I think that's when your creativity is developed, when you're young. I liked the world of the imagination because it was an easy place to go to.

author: John 5
quote: I know it sounds corny, but I think the meaning of life is to do what you love and be happy.

author: Paul Hawken
quote: Always leave enough time in your life to do something that makes you happy, satisfied, even joyous. That has more of an effect on economic well-being than any other single factor.

author: Christian Dior
quote: All I required to be happy was friendship and people I could admire.

author: Nikola Jokic
quote: A point makes you happy; an assist makes you and your teammate happy. An assist makes two people happy.

author: Brian Wilson
quote: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.

author: Shawn Kemp
quote: Trust me, I have had my days where I don't feel great about myself. You have those days where you kind of get down. But for the most part, I have been able to stay focused and happy and use my time wisely.

author: Olivia Munn
quote: I think women should start to embrace their age. What's the alternative to getting older? You die. I can't change the day I was born. But I can take care of my skin, my body, my mind, and try to live my life and be happy.

author: Alan Alda
quote: It isn't necessary to be rich and famous to be happy. It's only necessary to be rich.

author: Iggy Azalea
quote: I always say: 'Share your happiness with the world, give other people that happiness and let it come back,' but some things make me question it. I don't know if I want some people to know that I am happy. I think a lot of people want to take it away from you, and that's really scary.

author: Jerry Jones
quote: When I look back on my life, I overpaid for my big successes every time. And when I tried to get a bargain, get it a little cheaper or get a better deal on it, I ended up usually either getting it and not happy I got it. Or missing it.

author: Drew Scott
quote: It's so important for people to have a space that they love, and that you wake up happy every morning in your house. A big part of that is what you have for your furniture, your art, your decor.

author: Liv Tyler
quote: Oh, my God, this amazing cool breeze is coming through my window and the sun is shining. I'm happy.

author: Kirstin Maldonado
quote: Success is not defined by money or status, necessarily, but by how many people you've impacted and how fulfilled you feel with your decisions. If you can garner all of these things, then more power and success to you, but all in all, you must feel happy and satisfied with what you personally have put out into the world.

author: Whitney Wolfe Herd
quote: Love, friendship, networking - these are all critical connections and the foundation of a healthy, happy life.

author: Joey Ramone
quote: I enjoyed my life when I had nothing... and kinda like the idea of just being happy with me.

author: Bette Midler
quote: The worst part of success is to try finding someone who is happy for you.

author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
quote: Being happy is a matter of personal taste.

author: Skrillex
quote: I don't care about having money. It's about being happy, man.

author: Berkeley Breathed
quote: It's never too late to have a happy childhood.

author: DaBaby
quote: It's just the risk that I take and the sacrifice that I make: Putting myself, my career, my family's peace of mind on the line just to do right by my fans. It ain't no gray area: You're either with that and willing to go out of your way to make people who contribute to your dreams coming true happy or you aren't.

author: Lilly Singh
quote: In my life I've gone through a lot of really hard times. I went through depression and had so many challenges that I overcame. And I overcame because I just decided to be happy.

author: Drew McIntyre
quote: I am happy to do anything that comes my way, and I will always do my best in anything that presents itself.

author: Ewan McGregor
quote: Producing good stuff can be quite tough, and it involves a lot of frustration, but I always like things to be jolly and happy, and I forget that's actually not the point at the end of the day.

author: Rohit Sharma
quote: I am happy with the way I hit the ball. There is a certain element of power into it but not completely. It is like 80 per cent timing and 20 per cent power. Why do I need power hitting when I can clear the ropes with timing?

author: Rachel Morrison
quote: Photography was a way for me to freeze time and to capture the moments that were happy and healthy. I saw a photo as a way to go back to a memory if I ever needed to.

author: Juan Mata
quote: Obviously, when I play well and win a trophy, I feel happy about myself.

author: Walt Handelsman
quote: Be happy that you're growing older, that you're maturing, that you're smarter, that you're wiser.

author: Kim Petras
quote: I definitely always took my problems and turned them into music, and the more I can make myself feel happy, the better. But yeah, I definitely feel like music was always a place for me to, like, escape to. I just love songs that are fantasy.

author: Cory Hardrict
quote: I love helping people; just being of service makes me happy!

author: Angie Harmon
quote: I'm the kind of person who wants the people around me to be comfortable, to laugh, and to have a fabulous time - I want them to be as happy as I am.

author: Jonathan Coe
quote: I'm one of those unlucky people who had a happy childhood.

author: Gabby Douglas
quote: You know, God has a plan for me, and I'm going to follow in his footsteps and just rejoice and be happy.

author: Fred
quote: I'm really happy to be working with Jose Mourinho. He's a great person and he's always keen to communicate with the squad and help people to be communicative regarding what they're to do on the pitch.

author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
quote: A man is happy so long as he chooses to be happy and nothing can stop him.

author: Kubra Sait
quote: Smile from your heart; nothing is more beautiful than a woman who is happy to be herself.

author: Gregory Hines
quote: My character had been in the chair for seven years. He had gone through his anger, depression, drug and alcohol abuse. He had gone through everything, now he was up, he was happy, he was filled with his dream.

author: Daisaku Ikeda
quote: A genuinely happy person is one who has rendered others happy.

author: Karen Salmansohn
quote: The grass is always greener on the other side - until you get there and see it's AstroTurf. Symbols are never reality. Someone might have amassed material success and fame, but that doesn't mean they're happy. So, don't go judging a person's life by the cover.

author: Samuel Pepys
quote: As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!

author: Oneohtrix Point Never
quote: Before puberty, it seems like I was more or less smiling a lot. I was really outgoing and wanted to have a happy life.

author: Mac Miller
quote: My ideology was, if I just make very happy music, very happy music, then people will forget about whatever their problems are. I will forget about my problems.

author: Tommy Lasorda
quote: When we win, I'm so happy I eat a lot. When we lose, I'm so depressed, I eat a lot. When we're rained out, I'm so disappointed I eat a lot.

author: Rolando McClain
quote: I don't know if I'm ready to know what triggers my anger. I just feel like I figured out on my own how to stay calm, how to enjoy life, how to be happy.

author: Thucydides
quote: Be convinced that to be happy means to be free and that to be free means to be brave. Therefore do not take lightly the perils of war.

author: Tommy Chong
quote: When you hit a groove, it's not you; it's the spirit world. The spirits whisper the ideas in your brain and prod you along. They're the ones that are really happy.

author: James Allen
quote: A man is not rightly conditioned until he is a happy, healthy, and prosperous being; and happiness, health, and prosperity are the result of a harmonious adjustment of the inner with the outer of the man with his surroundings.

author: Buddy Guy
quote: I've never missed a gig yet. Music makes people happy, and that's why I go on doing it - I like to see everybody smile.

author: Rico Nasty
quote: I love when people are just naturally happy people.

author: Sean Covey
quote: Ultimately, you choose to be happy or miserable. The reality is that although you are free to choose, you can't choose the consequences of your choices. They're preloaded. It's a package deal.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: The most happy man is he who knows how to bring into relation the end and beginning of his life.

author: David Bowie
quote: It would be my guess that Madonna is not a very happy woman. From my own experience, having gone through persona changes like that, that kind of clawing need to be the center of attention is not a pleasant place to be.

author: Richard Gere
quote: People don't understand what happiness is, so they have an idea of what will make them happy, but it never does.

author: Charles Kingsley
quote: All we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about.

author: Graham Greene
quote: Point me out the happy man and I will point you out either egotism, selfishness, evil - or else an absolute ignorance.

author: Adele
quote: I'm really happy to be me, and I'd like to think people like me more because I'm happy with myself and not because I refuse to conform to anything.

author: Paul J. Meyer
quote: By forgiving, we are training ourselves to be strong, confident, joyful, peaceful, happy, and loving. These positive attributes end up affecting every part of our lives.

author: Leon Russell
quote: I am happy with what comes, I don't have expectations of any stature.

author: Shoojit Sircar
quote: I am happy that I am back and with a great project like 'Vicky Donor.' I have had a hard time in the past with 'Johnny Mastana' getting stuck but I hope this film brings positiveness into my life.

author: D. L. Hughley
quote: No matter how bad things are, you can at least be happy that you woke up this morning.

author: George Harrison
quote: In the end, you're trying to find God. That's the result of not being satisfied. And it doesn't matter how much money, or property, or whatever you've got, unless you're happy in your heart, then that's it. And unfortunately, you can never gain perfect happiness unless you've got that state of consciousness that enables that.

author: Ice T
quote: Being cool is when you win, you don't get too happy; and when you lose, you don't get too mad.

author: Steve Wynn
quote: Money doesn't make people happy. People make people happy.

author: Padma Lakshmi
quote: It doesn't matter how precisely the onion is cut as long as the person chewing it is happy.

author: James Longstreet
quote: I hope to live long enough to see my surviving comrades march side by side with the Union veterans along Pennsylvania Avenue, and then I will die happy.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: A man will speedily sit down and sympathize with a friend's griefs, but if he sees him honored and esteemed, he is apt to regard him as a rival and does not so readily rejoice with him. This ought not to be; without effort, we ought to be happy in our brother's happiness.

author: Stephane Hessel
quote: My mother once said to me, 'You must promise to be happy; it is the greatest favour you can do to others'. It has guided me throughout my life.

author: Huston Smith
quote: At the center of the religious life is a peculiar kind of joy, the prospect of a happy ending that blossoms from necessarily painful ordeals, the promise of human difficulties embraced and overcome.

author: Tyga
quote: I think, whatever makes you happy in life, you gotta do it. You can't plan in life too much.

author: Shahid Kapoor
quote: I don't think there's anybody in this world who should be required to make you feel good about yourself. Be happy on your own.

author: Bruce Lipton
quote: If we could get your subconscious mind to agree with your conscious mind about being happy, that's when your positive thoughts work.

author: David Hume
quote: He is happy whom circumstances suit his temper; but he Is more excellent who suits his temper to any circumstance.

author: W. H. Auden
quote: Like everything which is not the involuntary result of fleeting emotion but the creation of time and will, any marriage, happy or unhappy, is infinitely more interesting than any romance, however passionate.

author: Joan Jett
quote: I'm concentrating on staying healthy, having peace, being happy, remembering what is important, taking in nature and animals, spending time reading, trying to understand the universe, where science and the spiritual meet.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: Happy, happy Christmas, that can win us back to the delusions of our childhood days, recall to the old man the pleasures of his youth, and transport the traveler back to his own fireside and quiet home!

author: Walter Benjamin
quote: To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright.

author: Yotam Ottolenghi
quote: I love my garlic press; in fact, it is probably my one true desert island gadget. But I'm happy to put it aside whenever the smell and sweet taste of slow-cooked garlic is called for.

author: Billie Joe Armstrong
quote: No one's really happy anyway, it's not human.

author: Young Jeezy
quote: I love the streets, and the streets love me back. And when things ain't going the way they should go, they let you know... and when they happy, you gotta keep 'em happy.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: If we can but prevent the government from wasting the labours of the people, under the pretence of taking care of them, they must become happy.

author: Sharon Stone
quote: I'm enjoying my years, I'm enjoying my life, I'm enjoying my family. I'm just happy - a happy person.

author: Kid Rock
quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.

author: Tom Ford
quote: I am a spiritual person in an eastern religion kind of way. I learned that happiness for all of us is a switch that you flick in your brain. It doesn't have anything to do with getting a new house, a new car, a new girlfriend, or a new pair of shoes. Our culture is very much about that; we are never happy with what we have today.

author: Dev Anand
quote: If you are a creative person, then your mind gets sharper with age. My mind is very sharp, and I am happy for that.

author: Antoine Griezmann
quote: If I am happy in my personal life, I will be happy in my profession.

author: Jeff Foxworthy
quote: I know if mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy.

author: Naveen Jain
quote: I am proud of my kids and happy to brag about their achievements. Their success has been an immense source of happiness for me.

author: Dan Millman
quote: Act happy, feel happy, be happy, without a reason in the world. Then you can love, and do what you will.

author: Kelly LeBrock
quote: Success for me its to raise happy, healthy human beings.

author: Mikhail Bakunin
quote: People go to church for the same reasons they go to a tavern: to stupefy themselves, to forget their misery, to imagine themselves, for a few minutes anyway, free and happy.

author: Lee Hyeon-seo
quote: Breathing in South Korea, even though the life here is not easy, makes me so happy. I feel that sitting in a coffee shop, having a cup of tea, and looking out of the window at the blue sky - this is happiness. Truly happiness.

author: Eric Shanteau
quote: Being happy outside the pool means fast swimming in the pool.

author: Daniel Kahneman
quote: Experienced happiness refers to your feelings, to how happy you are as you live your life. In contrast, the satisfaction of the remembering self refers to your feelings when you think about your life.

author: Daniel Boone
