quote: Felicity, the companion of content, is rather found in our own breasts than in the enjoyment of external things; and I firmly believe it requires but a little philosophy to make a man happy in whatever state he is.

author: Kelsang Gyatso
quote: The purpose of meditation is to make our mind calm and peaceful. If our mind is peaceful, we will be free from worries and mental discomfort, and so we will experience true happiness. But if our mind is not peaceful, we will find it very difficult to be happy, even if we are living in the very best conditions.

author: Asin
quote: I don't wear any masks. If I am happy, you get to see it; if I am angry, then you get to see that also.

author: Ronald Koeman
quote: If you are a happy man then you can give your best.

author: Courtney Love
quote: Only dumb people are happy.

author: Jay-Z
quote: I collect art, and I drink wine... things that I like that I had never been exposed to. But I never said, 'I'm going to buy art to impress this crowd.' That's just ridiculous to me. I don't live my life like that, because how could you be happy with yourself?

author: Mick Foley
quote: Mother Nature and Father Time have not been happy with me.

author: Sergio Ramos
quote: I'm a very temperamental person, but when you are wearing the captain's armband for Real Madrid or the national team, it's best to express yourself in a different way. You have to maintain a sense of unity - a good atmosphere where everyone feels happy is one of the keys to success, and that's something you shouldn't lose.

author: Clara Schumann
quote: I do not want horses or diamonds - I am happy in possessing you.

author: Gloria Steinem
quote: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious. We have only to imagine how differently we would be described - and will be, after our deaths - by each of the family members who believe they know us.

author: Leah LaBelle
quote: I'm very comfortable in my skin. Everyone has insecurities - I joke around about wishing I had more cheeks - but I'm happy with who I am. You have to make do with what you have. If you carry yourself right, you can make anything look good.

author: Pia Wurtzbach
quote: If a woman is confident, she believes in herself and is really happy from the inside, you'll see that glow.

author: Billy Porter
quote: All you need to do is turn on the news, and in five minutes, you're depressed with the state of the world. Choosing joy is a completely active choice. It doesn't just happen. You can't just say, 'I want to be happy.' You have to take action.

author: Momina Mustehsan
quote: Only if you love yourself, only if you're happy with yourself and only if you know your own worth will you ever be happy.

author: Gavin Rossdale
quote: A happy wife is a happy life.

author: Manushi Chhillar
quote: My parents have always encouraged me to follow my dreams and do what makes me happy.

author: Monica Bellucci
quote: I was very shy as a girl. Absurdly shy, even. Maybe because I was an only child. And I think that's why I'm so happy to have two kids now.

author: T.I.
quote: I'm happy to be on a winning team. My individual success, that lasts for a short period of time. The success of being a part of the South, of Atlanta, which is now the hot bed of music, that's what's gonna last the longest. The fact that I contributed to planting our flag and moving music to my city, that's what I'm most proud of.

author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
quote: Before we set our hearts too much upon anything, let us examine how happy they are, who already possess it.

author: Sunny Deol
quote: I am happy with my family and my colleagues and want to continue making my own kind of cinema. I have never belonged to any camp and have no friends in the industry. Most of them will pay lip service, but when it comes to doing, they tend to shy away.

author: Michelle Pfeiffer
quote: And I'm a really happy person, I enjoy life. I think you see that on people. I think there's nothing more aging than misery.

author: Canelo Alvarez
quote: I'm very happy with what I've accomplished, but we're going for more.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Information helps you to see that you're not alone. That there's somebody in Mississippi and somebody in Tokyo who all have wept, who've all longed and lost, who've all been happy. So the library helps you to see, not only that you are not alone, but that you're not really any different from everyone else.

author: Olivia Colman
quote: I think a good dollop of sadness is quite a useful thing in comedy sometimes. I think if everyone's happy all the time, it's a bit dull. It's like salt and caramel - you wouldn't imagine they would go well together, but they do.

author: Kylie Jenner
quote: I've realized through the years that I just find happiness in other things, whether it's my dogs or my friends or, like, looking at the sunset. So if I were to wish for something else, it would just to be happy all the time, to have a superpower of not letting things affect me, and to be true to who I am, always.

author: Karolina Kurkova
quote: Mother Nature made me the way I am, and I should be happy.

author: Victoria Osteen
quote: Do good 'cause God wants you to be happy. When you come to church, when you worship Him, you're not doing it for God, really. You're doing it for yourself because that's what makes God happy.

author: Demetri Martin
quote: I wrapped my Christmas presents early this year, but I used the wrong paper. See, the paper I used said 'Happy Birthday' on it. I didn't want to waste it so I just wrote 'Jesus' on it.

author: Samuel Richardson
quote: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.

author: Dove Cameron
quote: It's not like you can say, 'This is the right side and this is the wrong side,' because obviously, a happy person is never going to want to inflict pain on somebody else. So the bullies are really victims themselves and yada, yada, yada, pop psychology, but it's true.

author: Neil Young
quote: It's cool to go places where working people are happy.

author: Beverly Sills
quote: A happy woman is one who has no cares at all; a cheerful woman is one who has cares but doesn't let them get her down.

author: Anne-Marie
quote: When I'm happy and in a good mood, I just search for other things that maybe connect to me on another level. I talk to my friends and see how they're feeling - see what's going on in their lives.

author: Virgil
quote: Happy the man who has been able to learn the causes of things.

author: Neil Turok
quote: I'd be perfectly happy with a mathematically precise description of how time began. I see science and religion as being two completely different things. I don't see science as relevant to the question of whether or not there's a God.

author: Daniel Gilbert
quote: Your emotions are meant to fluctuate, just like your blood pressure is meant to fluctuate. It's a system that's supposed to move back and forth, between happy and unhappy. That's how the system guides you through the world.

author: Kendrick Lamar
quote: I always thought money was something just to make me happy. But I've learned that I feel better being able to help my folks, 'cause we never had nothing. So just to see them excited about my career is more of a blessing than me actually having it for myself.

author: Jane Krakowski
quote: My new favourite smell is new baby smell. It makes me so happy. If someone could bottle that, I'd love to have it.

author: Raheem DeVaughn
quote: Whenever I am faced with someone spreading negativity in my relationship, I remember the old saying, 'Misery loves company.' I am also reminded to be mindful of the company you keep. Sometimes you cannot see a hater until you are happy. It is then that they demonstrate their negativity.

author: Mya
quote: Music makes me love life, and without it, I don't know if I'd be happy.

author: William Dean Howells
quote: What the American public wants in the theater is a tragedy with a happy ending.

author: Miranda Hart
quote: I only really and truly fully relax on my own. Give me a sun lounger, a pool and a sea view, and I'm happy.

author: Christina Tosi
quote: As a chef, I got into this because I love the creative energy and I love the science, but I also love to feed people and make them happy.

author: Vernon Howard
quote: The fact is, everything we want or yearn for is won through other people. No man on an island is happy; he is merely existing. The joyous life is the one filled with rich relationships.

author: Gisele Bundchen
quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.

author: Winona Ryder
quote: I feel my best when I'm happy.

author: Alexa Bliss
quote: I like to be sparkly! It makes me happy. I love to stand out and embrace my uniqueness, and I am very lucky I get to incorporate that into my gear. I hope the sparkle and glitter that I spread makes other people happy, too.

author: Charlie Trotter
quote: Any fool can be happy. What I'm interested in is satisfaction. There's got to be more to life than just being happy. You've got to be fulfilled. You've got to be satisfied; philosophically satisfied is what I mean.

author: Ava DuVernay
quote: If I can be in a place where my image is encouraging people to see different people behind the camera, and my image and the images I make can help open up a certain world view, I think that's all a part of a larger spirit of change and progress, and I'm happy to be part of it.

author: Claude Nicollier
quote: I feel very privileged to be part of this mission, and when my nomination was announced, I was really very, very happy to be selected for this mission.

author: Angie Thomas
quote: Of course, my mom is my biggest and loudest cheerleader, and my family and friends are happy for me, but I'm still just Angie, not Angie-the-author-with-this-hyped-up-book. I appreciate that.

author: Kapil Sharma
quote: Simple things make me very happy.

author: Kim Dotcom
quote: Always upbeat, always happy, always putting you in a good mood. That's what I want to achieve with my music.

author: Dirk Benedict
quote: From dear, dear Gloria Swanson, I learned how to live long, happy and free of health problems. I owe her my life.

author: Octavia E. Butler
quote: I'm very happy alone.

author: Jean de la Bruyere
quote: We must laugh before we are happy, for fear of dying without having laughed at all.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.

author: Marina Abramovic
quote: Happiness is such a good state, it doesn't need to be creative. You're not creative from happiness, you're just happy. You're creative when you're miserable and depressed. You find the key to transform things. Happiness does not need to transform.

author: Joachim du Bellay
quote: Happy the man who, like Ulysses, has made a fine voyage, or has won the Golden Fleece, and then returns, experienced and knowledgeable, to spend the rest of his life among his family.

author: Cynthia Nixon
quote: I am definitely as happy as I've ever been. Happier, I would say, than I've ever been.

author: Matthew McConaughey
quote: I like the city. I like the concrete. I like big business. I like being a CEO of my own company and having a lot of responsibilities. At the same time, when I can go off with a backpack or off on a surfboard or even off on a run somewhere in the woods - that's where I'm really happy.

author: Larry Hagman
quote: I'm happy to be here. I'm happy to be anywhere. I'm not kidding.

author: Hamlin Garland
quote: Whenever the pressure of our complex city life thins my blood and numbs my brain, I seek relief in the trail; and when I hear the coyote wailing to the yellow dawn, my cares fall from me - I am happy.

author: Gladys Taber
quote: Christmas is a bridge. We need bridges as the river of time flows past. Today's Christmas should mean creating happy hours for tomorrow and reliving those of yesterday.

author: Dylan Lauren
quote: My parents always told me, 'Do what you love because that is what you will do well in.' They told me to make sure that you are happy.

author: Emily Carr
quote: Trees love to toss and sway; they make such happy noises.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: I've arrived at the place if I'm not taking a career risk, I'm not happy. If I'm scared, then I know I'm being challenged.

author: Kirstie Alley
quote: I binge when I'm happy. When everything is going really well, every day is like I'm at a birthday party.

author: Orlando Bloom
quote: I'm so happy to have been a part of that process and I would go straight back into the desert in a ton of chain mail for Ridley any day of the week. He's an amazing director and I can't wait to see the long version.

author: Dale Evans
quote: Happy trails to you, until we meet again.

author: Robertson Davies
quote: Only a fool expects to be happy all the time.

author: P. V. Sindhu
quote: If it makes me happy, it definitely adds to my well-being.

author: Mike Fisher
quote: Real and true happiness is having a relationship with God and not what makes us happy.

author: Joy Fielding
quote: I'm very happy being me, although sometimes I'd love to be a bird so that I could fly.

author: John Carmack
quote: Programming is not a zero-sum game. Teaching something to a fellow programmer doesn't take it away from you. I'm happy to share what I can, because I'm in it for the love of programming.

author: Al Yankovic
quote: As my father used to tell me, the only true sign of success in life is being able to do for a living that which makes you happy.

author: Mick Schumacher
quote: What he has done is the best ever in F1. It is something I look up to, and I am happy to have him as my dad.

author: Raheem Sterling
quote: If people want to write about my mum's bathroom in her house, all I have to tell you is that 15 years ago, we were cleaning toilets in Stonebridge and getting breakfast out of the vending machine. If anybody deserves to be happy, it's my mum.

author: Kate Middleton
quote: I hope we will be able to have a happy family ourselves.

author: Damon Albarn
quote: The things that make me happy most are my family and working.

author: Arnold Bennett
quote: Happiness includes chiefly the idea of satisfaction after full honest effort. No one can possibly be satisfied and no one can be happy who feels that in some paramount affairs he failed to take up the challenge of life.

author: Holly Holm
quote: At the end of the day, you are in control of your own happiness. Life is going to happen whether you overthink it, overstress it or not. Just experience life and be happy along the way. You can't control everything in your life, but you can control your happiness.

author: Moby
quote: If Nirvana had remained a small, underground punk rock band, Kurt Cobain would still be alive. And he'd probably be living in Seattle, getting kind of fat and balding, be relatively happy and producing records for other people.

author: Kevin Bacon
quote: A moustache is actually the one thing I really can grow. One of the bad parts about my facial hair situation is that I can't grow sideburns. I'm happy to still have my own hair on my head, but I can't grow any sideburns. If you ever see me with sideburns, they're not real.

author: Aditya Roy Kapur
quote: I'm happy in my own world, and I'm also a good boy.

author: John Updike
quote: America is a vast conspiracy to make you happy.

author: Cindy Busby
quote: I'd say that I'm a very friendly, outgoing, happy person who just wants to make the people around me happy.

author: Lothar Matthaus
quote: I live in Budapest and saw how the football helped the Hungarian people to be happy.

author: Munshi Premchand
quote: The world assumes that we are very happy with high mansions, fine carriages, servants and attendants, huge investments, and concubines. But he who is without the honor and strength of the soul can be anything but happy.

author: Joel Burns
quote: There are so many happy memories that will be made. You just have to live long enough to get to them.

author: Chris Bosh
quote: We're all making decisions to make ourselves happy and our families happy. That doesn't take away what we've done together and the special bond that we created and the special bond that we have and just all the memories that we had together. That will never change. As you move forward, you appreciate those moments and keep going forward.

author: Michel de Montaigne
quote: It is the mind that maketh good or ill, That maketh wretch or happy, rich or poor.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
quote: Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.

author: Marlene Dietrich
quote: A man would prefer to come home to an unmade bed and a happy woman than to a neatly made bed and an angry woman.

author: Naveen Patnaik
quote: Healthy Odisha - Happy Odisha. Let us continue our endeavour to build a prosperous and strong state.

author: Lee Byung-hun
quote: Just like other ordinary people, I want to have a happy family.

author: James Arthur
quote: I wasn't a happy kid. I felt like my mum ruined our chance of a better life, because when she remarried, we went to live in Bahrain, on a compound with a swimming pool, and she ruined it all.

author: Claire Holt
quote: One of the greatest gifts in life is giving time and giving love. It helps me to stay grateful and happy.

author: Sheryl Swoopes
quote: I'm at a place in my life right now where I'm very happy, very content. I'm finally OK with the idea of who I love, who I want to be with.

author: Macklemore
quote: I got sober, and I got happy again.

author: Jennifer Hudson
quote: I love being nurturing and caring because I love to see other people happy.

author: Nina Agdal
quote: I surround myself with positive, happy people. And I always try to balance things that I have to do with things that I want to do.

author: Frederick Sanger
quote: I was married to Margaret Joan Howe in 1940. Although not a scientist herself she has contributed more to my work than anyone else by providing a peaceful and happy home.

author: Dorothy Dix
quote: We are never happy until we learn to laugh at ourselves.

author: Parker Palmer
quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy.

author: Cara Delevingne
quote: I worked hard to be accepted by the fashion community in ways beyond my physical appearance. In no time, though, I found myself surrendering to the industry's approval process. I felt like I needed validation from everyone. As a result, I lost sight of myself and what it meant to be happy, what it meant to be successful.

author: John Mayer
quote: You get to a certain age where you prepare yourself for happiness. Sometimes you never remember to actually get happy.

author: Niki de St. Phalle
quote: It's my destiny to make a place where people can come and be happy: a garden of joy.

author: Bruce Feiler
quote: When faced with a challenge, happy families, like happy people, just add a new chapter to their life story that shows them overcoming the hardship. This skill is particularly important for children, whose identity tends to get locked in during adolescence.

author: Susanna Kaysen
quote: Not everything has a happy ending, and not everything has an ending. Some things just kind of dribble away or cut off abruptly.

author: Anna Akhmatova
quote: It was a time when only the dead smiled, happy in their peace.

author: Tom Petty
quote: Go after what you really love and find a way to make that work for you, and then you'll be a happy person.

author: Jim Mattis
quote: Fight with a happy heart.

author: Emma McKeon
quote: To do a PB in an Olympic final - I'm pretty happy - you can't ask for more, that's the fastest time I have ever swum.

author: Cyril Connolly
quote: We must select the illusion which appeals to our temperament, and embrace it with passion, if we want to be happy.

author: Vincent Cassel
quote: French people are never happy with what they have. They're always complaining. They're happy when they're complaining.

author: Sun Yang
quote: I am happy with my confidence level.

author: Jon Bon Jovi
quote: You just stay the course, and do what it is that you do, and grow while you're doing it. Eventually it will either come full circle, or at least you'll go to bed at night happy.

author: Albert Camus
quote: To be happy we must not be too concerned with others.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.

author: Tim Burton
quote: I've always been misrepresented. You know, I could dress in a clown costume and laugh with the happy people but they'd still say I'm a dark personality.

author: Jennifer Lopez
quote: My parents wanted me to be a lawyer. But I don't think I would have been very happy. I'd be in front of the jury singing.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: The man with a toothache thinks everyone happy whose teeth are sound. The poverty-stricken man makes the same mistake about the rich man.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad.

author: Ellen Datlow
quote: Horror isn't only about ghosts or monsters. For example, paranormal romance seems the antithesis of horror. Once you have a sexy, fun vampire who is sweet, and you have a happy ending, it's not horror.

author: Cyd Charisse
quote: To make a man happy, treat him like a dog - plenty of affection and a loose leash.

author: Sophie Turner
quote: You've got to be happy when you play a sad character; otherwise, you just get depressed. Make your real life as fun as possible.

author: A. E. Housman
quote: That is the land of lost content, I see it shining plain, the happy highways where I went and cannot come again.

author: Cornelia Funke
quote: A library book, I imagine, is a happy book.

author: Sam Hargrave
quote: I am happy to say that I am living my dream.

author: Sophocles
quote: Deem no man happy until he passes the end of his life without suffering grief.

author: Katrina Lake
quote: Every day, every one of us sets the stage for our sentiment, our confidence, and our success by getting dressed. When you feel great, when you feel your best, it opens up a world of possibility. Feeling confident and self-assured are important inputs into good days, successful days, and happy days.

author: Niall Horan
quote: I'm the most carefree, happy person you'll meet.

author: Tom Hodgkinson
quote: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.

author: Samin Nosrat
quote: I've never tasted a store-bought tortilla that compares in texture or flavor with one made by hand, so I'm happy to invest some time. It's worth it just to see a friend take her first bite and understand, finally, that a flour tortilla is meant to be an essential component, not just a lackluster wrapper.

author: Mod Sun
quote: I think that the only pure thing we have in life is to try to be happy.

author: Martha Beck
quote: If I tell a man he needs to quit his soul-sucking job, he has to go home and fight with his wife or fight with his parents and fight with his in-laws and fight with everybody, because men aren't supposed to be happy; they're supposed to do well.

author: Sid Waddell
quote: He looks about as happy as a penguin in a microwave.

author: Sam Smith
quote: I've had an amazing life, but I think I was born with a little bit of sadness in me. I've always been attracted to those things, whether it's sad movies, sad music... when you're sad, you feel everything in a greater way than you do when you're happy.

author: Olympia Dukakis
quote: Most of us are not real eager to grow, myself included. We try to be happy by staying in the status quo. But if we're not willing to be honest with ourselves about what we feel, we don't evolve.

author: Andrew Robertson
quote: I set myself high standards, and when I drop below them, I'm not happy about it.

author: Carlos Castaneda
quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.

author: Douglas Coupland
quote: I'm not a hoarder, I'm a collector: if you have something you like, every time you see it, you have a little happy hit.

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
quote: While experiencing happiness, we have difficulty in being conscious of it. Only when the happiness is past and we look back on it do we suddenly realise - sometimes with astonishment - how happy we had been.

author: Ranbir Kapoor
quote: I truly believe that God has given us few brain cells, and you have to direct them to the right things that make you happy.

author: Parker Harris
quote: I think the legacy is really the company that we built. That's what makes me happy. I'm a very simple person, so that's all I really need.

author: Stephen Graham
quote: Mum and Dad always wanted me to do whatever I was happy doing. I nearly went to art college at 16, but decided to do a BTEC in performing arts.

author: Elle Fanning
quote: I don't think you should try to be anything you're not. If you're not smiling all the time or always happy - I don't think it matters. If you're having bad day, show you're having a bad day. Don't try to put up something that's fake.

author: Gerard Malanga
quote: Be happy in what you do. Be respectful of yourself. Do good works for others, and the goodness will come back to you and make you a better person. I think that's what happiness is all about.

author: Aamir Khan
quote: I am happy that I have entertained people and made them happy.

author: Solange Knowles
quote: My beauty ethos? Well, I'd love to tell you it's something like 'less is more,' but honestly, it all starts with happiness. If only someone could bottle that up - when I'm happy, I'm at my most radiant and glowing. It does me better than any product ever could. And I stand by how cheesy and cliched that sounds.

author: Gerald Brenan
quote: In a happy marriage it is the wife who provides the climate, the husband the landscape.

author: Rich Piana
quote: I'm happy with everything I chose and happy with the way everything went in my life.

author: Danny Meyer
quote: At the base level, a burger is a piece of meat and a bun with something on it. It's simple but it seems to make a lot of people happy.

author: Joan Collins
quote: If you feel well and happy, your face will reflect this, but if you are down in the dumps and having a miserable time, your face will soon show this, too. In fact, you get the face you deserve by the time you're forty, and one of the keys to looking and feeling younger is being active.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: There is inestimable blessing in a cheerful spirit. When the soul throws its windows wide open, letting in the sunshine, and presenting to all who see it the evidence of its gladness, it is not only happy, but it has an unspeakable power of doing good.

author: James Stewart
quote: I've wrestled with reality for 35 years, and I'm happy, Doctor, I finally won out over it.

author: Thibaut Courtois
quote: There is no reason not to be happy at Chelsea.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Feeling sorry for ourselves is the most useless waste of energy on the planet. It does absolutely no good. We can't let our circumstances or what others do or don't do control us. We can decide to be happy regardless.

author: Hannah Murray
quote: Turns out you have a really fun time if you go to work every day and focus on being silly and funny and happy!

author: Jens Lekman
quote: I'm very very happy for my hardships and misfortunes: they build character and make you a better person. Even if I think it's something you have to carry with you, it's definitely something that makes you more empathic towards other people, makes you understand people and relationships so much better.

author: Anna Kendrick
quote: Okay, I am happy with the way I look, but I have never, never, ever thought of myself as a 'pretty girl.' Honestly. When I read some of these scripts I'm sent, and they describe the heroine as 'incredibly beautiful,' I wonder why they sent it to me.

author: Bebe Buell
quote: I want people to see that there are happy endings, that we do achieve our goals, that it's never too late.

author: Joseph Roux
quote: When unhappy, one doubts everything; when happy, one doubts nothing.

author: Emily Atack
quote: A social life is just as important to me as my work life because I think if you have a healthy balance of the two, you'll be really happy.

author: Harry Connick, Jr.
quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.

author: Andy Griffith
quote: Lonesome Rhodes had wild mood swings. He'd be very happy, he'd be very said, he'd be very angry, very depressed, and I had to pull all of these emotions out of myself. And it wasn't easy.

author: Marlo Thomas
quote: Laughter is important, not only because it makes us happy, it also has actual health benefits. And that's because laughter completely engages the body and releases the mind. It connects us to others, and that in itself has a healing effect.

author: Beth Ditto
quote: My mother told me Homer Ditto was not my father. Nope. Mom had had a fling with some other guy who was my dad. Some dude who didn't stick around too long who Mom was happy to get rid of. She chose Homer, and Homer chose me, so he lent me his name even though I didn't have his blood.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: Lindsay Lohan
quote: I am happy being able to play roles with people my age because once you do something really mature there is no turning back.

author: Thierry Henry
quote: But the moment I've got a ball at my feet, I'm happy.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world.

author: Kurt Cobain
quote: I'm so happy because today I found my friends - they're in my head.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quote: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work.

author: Nell Carter
quote: 'Gimme a Break' ran for six years and gave me the kind of money and freedom that I'd dreamed would make me happy. It didn't.

author: Elizabeth Smart
quote: I will feel like a success if I raise my children to be kind and happy people.

author: Gretchen Rubin
quote: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.

author: Sanya Malhotra
quote: I am so happy to be a meme.

author: Demi Lovato
quote: Never be ashamed of what you feel. You have the right to feel any emotion that you want, and to do what makes you happy. That's my life motto.

author: Britt Ekland
quote: As for the stage fright, it never goes away. When I'm waiting in the wings to go on, it's agony every single time but I stay focused and I know that once I'm on stage it'll be fine; I'll be in my happy little bubble.

author: Tina Turner
quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.

author: Katy Perry
quote: I don't need the Prince Charming to have my own happy ending.

author: Nobu Matsuhisa
quote: Chefs are artists, and I couldn't be happy with my art if I was forced to use cheap ingredients.

author: Sharon Van Etten
quote: I don't think I'll ever feel perfectly balanced, but I feel like I'm figuring it out, and I'm surrounded by really wonderful people that want to see me succeed and be happy. Life is wild.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: Even if you're happy with the life you've chosen, you're still curious about the other options.

author: Ben Stein
quote: The human spirit needs to accomplish, to achieve, to triumph to be happy.

author: Ravindra Jadeja
quote: When you play good competitive cricket and win matches for your team, you always feel happy.

author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.
quote: I love snowboarding. It's probably my favorite sport. I love sitting on top of the mountain and the snow falling and that silence, that snow silence. That's, like, a very peaceful, happy place for me.

author: Patrick Ness
quote: Happiness is precious, and so I prefer to keep mine private. In a world where everyone shares everything, I can think of a lot of happy moments, but they're mine.

author: Eamonn Walker
quote: I do my work and do the best I can. I'm quite happy with my anonymity. All I can ever hope for is that I continue to do great work that will be remembered, and I leave my imprint so that my son can say proudly, 'That's my dad!'

author: Romelu Lukaku
quote: When you're not happy, you don't need to fake your emotions.

author: Ada Lovelace
quote: I am never so happy as when I am really engaged in good earnest, & it makes me must wonderfully cheerful & merry at other times, which is curious & very satisfactory.

author: Eric Yuan
quote: I don't mind working long hours, because I enjoy doing that. The way to make myself happy is to work long hours.

author: Carson Kressley
quote: I think ultimately I make people happy: Whether I'm doing the stage show, giving somebody a makeover, or designing clothing, the end goal is to make people smile.

author: Grant Morrison
quote: I'm lucky to have a job doing something I really love to do, and I'm happy to accept the pressures of relentless deadlines or reader expectations as necessary evils. It's probably not as stressful as mining coal or leading men into battle.

author: Kygo
quote: I feel like music can affect you in so many ways. When you hear a song with a happy melody, it can change your mood; it can change your day.

author: Kenan Thompson
quote: I'm a happy person, and I want everybody else to be happy. Nothing wrong with that.

author: David Ulevitch
quote: When people ask me, 'Are you happy?' I respond with, 'You've asked the wrong question.' There is a deep kind of satisfaction you get from building a company. This kind of satisfaction transcends happy, sad, hard, or easy. I seek satisfaction. I want to be positively disruptive.

author: Princess Diana
quote: They say it is better to be poor and happy than rich and miserable, but how about a compromise like moderately rich and just moody?

author: Amrish Puri
quote: I am happy to play the bad man.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: I don't see myself as beautiful, because I can see a lot of flaws. People have really odd opinions. They tell me I'm skinny, as if that's supposed to make me happy.

author: Rose Namajunas
quote: I'm successful every day because I look in the mirror, and I'm happy with who I am.

author: Francois Lelord
quote: Very different from eros is philia, a serene love much more akin to friendship, with its reciprocal kindnesses. You love each other for the happy experiences and pleasures you share.

author: Katha Pollitt
quote: Sure, men like a challenge - but so do women. And nobody likes to be challenged all the time. I know plenty of long-standing happy couples who slept together right away, spent hours yakking on the phone, split checks down the middle, and lived together for years before the wedding.

author: Claire Tomalin
quote: I enjoyed the whole process of learning and was always happy when autumn came and school or college started up again.

author: Krzysztof Kieslowski
quote: To tell you the truth, in my work, love is always in opposition to the elements. It creates dilemmas. It brings in suffering. We can't live with it, and we can't live without it. You'll rarely find a happy ending in my work.

author: John Lee Hooker
quote: I am a happy man. I've had a good life.

author: Neil Patrick Harris
quote: Rather than ignore those who choose to publish their opinions without actually talking to me, I am happy to dispel any rumors or misconceptions and am quite proud to say that I am a very content gay man living my life to the fullest and feel most fortunate to be working with wonderful people in the business I love.

author: Deborah Meaden
quote: You need emotional intelligence; to be happy to take risks; to be competitive and to look forward not backwards.

author: Alison Gopnik
quote: Samuel Johnson called it the vanity of human wishes, and Buddhists talk about the endless cycle of desire. Social psychologists say we get trapped on a hedonic treadmill. What they all mean is that we wish, plan and work for things that we think will make us happy, but when we finally get them, we aren't nearly as happy as we thought we'd be.

author: Chris Cooper
quote: You look at a herd of cattle and well, they all look the same... but they know. They all have an individual personality, and those personalities change from day to day. They can have their grumpy days and their happy days and their serene days. But it's unpredictable. You can't be off in outer space when you're dealing with animals.

author: Yuvraj Singh
quote: Cricket is my life. Before the cancer, I was happy-go-lucky. I used to think about my career and worry about the future. But post it, my thinking has completely changed. I'm happy to eat and breathe normally. I'm happy to have my life back.

author: Aphra Behn
quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.

author: Luise Rainer
quote: Happiness lies in moments, and while you have it, you're not even aware; only afterwards do you know you were happy.

author: Dahyun
quote: I'm rather happy with sweats, slippers and no make-up on.

author: Son Heung-min
quote: In every country I've gone to, if you smile at people, they are going to be happy. This is my attitude.

author: Shaheer Sheikh
quote: I was happy being a lawyer, and the thought of becoming a model or even actor never came to my mind, even though I knew I looked good.

author: David Lloyd
quote: The Guy Fawkes mask has now become a common brand and a convenient placard to use in protest against tyranny - and I'm happy with people using it; it seems quite unique, an icon of popular culture being used this way.

author: Ricki-Lee Coulter
quote: One day I looked in the mirror, and I wasn't happy. If you're not feeling good mentally, emotionally and physically, you're just a mess - and that's the point I felt like. It was a change in attitude and a shift in lifestyle. There's no crazy diet; I train six days a week, and I eat really well.

author: Ali Fazal
quote: I am happy with the way things are turning out for me because it is only my hard work and no one else's push.

author: Erica Fernandes
quote: The simplest of simplest things makes me happy. I love small gestures and nature in life.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: The only way to avoid being miserable is not to have enough leisure to wonder whether you are happy or not.

author: Dolph Ziggler
quote: I'm constantly unsatisfied with any situation, which is both good and bad, because never being fully happy drives me to better every day... but I don't enjoy the things that I do even when I do them great.

author: Salim Akil
quote: No matter how happy and peaceful you can be at a certain time, you always have this - at least, I do - paranoia or catastrophic thought that even now that I have all this peace and quiet, what's the next challenge? What's coming next? On a very human level, I think most people can identify with that.

author: Ruth Glick
quote: I've always thought that, as a romance writer, I had the best job in the world. I sit around all day making up emotion-drenched, conflict-laden stories that push my heroes and heroines to the edge of sanity. Then I give them a happy ending.

author: Honore de Balzac
quote: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are.

author: Dean Norris
quote: If you force yourself to smile, within a couple minutes, you feel happy.

author: Lara Giddings
quote: I am hopeful that one day I will meet that right man and will have a very happy life partner.

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: I think happiness is a choice. If you feel yourself being happy and can settle in to the life choices you make, then it's great. It's really, really great. I swear to God, happiness is the best makeup.

author: Paul Bettany
quote: We all have different thresholds for sentimentality. For me, it's a hard won happy ending.

author: W. Kamau Bell
quote: I'm happy that I know how to speak 'Southern.' I spent a lot of time in Alabama throughout my life. I even lived there for part of junior high and high school, so I learned the true beauty and mastery of the Southern dialect. 'Y'all' is one of the greatest and most useful words ever invented.

author: Konstantinos Karamanlis
quote: I invite all those who share my anxiety about, and hopes for, the future, and who burn with the desire for a political rebirth, to enlist with us. And addressing myself especially to the young, I invite them to become the vanguard in this sortie of national reconstruction. For a proud and happy Greece!

author: Himesh Reshammiya
quote: When my father is happy with my music, I know I have done something good, and there is no question of generation gap.

author: Mark Goulston
quote: If you look for things your partner does wrong, you can always find something. If you look for what he or she does right, you can always find something, too. It all depends on what you want to look for. Happy couples accentuate the positive.

author: Carl Jung
quote: The word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.

author: Glover Teixeira
quote: It's so great to fight in the UFC because the whole staff, they treat you so well. The people are happy to work there.

author: Albert Camus
quote: The struggle itself towards the heights is enough to fill a man's heart. One must imagine Sisyphus happy.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: How can a woman be expected to be happy with a man who insists on treating her as if she were a perfectly normal human being.

author: Georgia Toffolo
quote: With my reading, I like something with quite a happy ending.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: Rodrigo Santoro
quote: I am very fortunate, very grateful for everything that has happened to me, everything I've done, all the opportunities, so I'm very happy.

author: William James
quote: We don't laugh because we're happy - we're happy because we laugh.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: The only ones among you who will be really happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: God wants to use you to make other people happy! And the happier you make others, the happier you will be because you reap what you sow.

author: Elon Musk
quote: If I'm not in love, if I'm not with a long-term companion, I cannot be happy.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.

author: Alicia Keys
quote: I'm a very positive person, but this whole concept of having to always be nice, always smiling, always happy, that's not real. It was like I was wearing a mask. I was becoming this perfectly chiselled sculpture, and that was bad. That took a long time to understand.

author: Ovid
quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.

author: Immanuel Kant
quote: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy.

author: Epicurus
quote: If thou wilt make a man happy, add not unto his riches but take away from his desires.

author: Anne Hathaway
quote: If you're not someone who has a natural and effortless love for yourself, it's hard to let go of your desire to please other people, and that's really not an ingredient for a happy life.

author: Gretchen Bleiler
quote: I learned a few years ago that balance is the key to a happy and successful life, and a huge part of achieving that balance is to instill rituals into your everyday life - a nutritious balanced diet, daily exercise, time for yourself through meditation, reading, journaling, yoga, daily reflection, and setting goals.

author: Sebastian Vettel
quote: I don't care what other people think as long as I am happy. The day I die or retire, I have blown all my chances because I don't have the chance any more to change my image as an F1 driver.

author: Stephon Marbury
quote: When you're happy, and you're smiling people don't like that. That's why I smile all the time.

author: Post Malone
quote: I'm a pretty happy guy.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: The moment that changed me for ever was the moment my first child was born. I was happy, filled with hope, and thought, 'Now I understand the whole point of work, of life, of love.'

author: Khris Middleton
quote: I'm happy with being myself.

author: Gaspar Noe
quote: I'm a happy person. When a happy person makes a cruel movie, it becomes funny.

author: H. L. Mencken
quote: The only really happy folk are married women and single men.

author: Dusan Tadic
quote: I am happy to give assists. It's my way of thinking and I expect that from my team-mate for me.

author: Ann Landers
quote: The poor wish to be rich, the rich wish to be happy, the single wish to be married, and the married wish to be dead.

author: Mirko Cro Cop
quote: I usually train twice a day, and Thursdays and Sundays are supposed to be my days off. But even on those days, I'm training at least once. I have to do at least one session each day to be happy.

author: Lionel Messi
quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: My belief is that we were put into this world of wonders and beauty with a special ability to appreciate them, in some cases to have the fun of taking a hand in developing them, and also in being able to help other people instead of overreaching them and, through it all, to enjoy life - that is, to be happy.

author: Sissy Spacek
quote: I lived an idyllic 'Huckleberry Finn' life in a tiny town. Climbing trees. Tagging after brothers. Happy. Barefoot on my pony. It was 'To Kill a Mockingbird'-esque.

author: Solon
quote: Let no man be called happy before his death. Till then, he is not happy, only lucky.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: If you're working for a good company and you're happy there, and you're being compensated accordingly, and your work satisfies you, you should stay there.

author: Robert Green Ingersoll
quote: The time to be happy is now, and the place to be happy is here.

author: Fran Lebowitz
quote: Remember that as a teenager you are in the last stage of your life when you will be happy to hear the phone is for you.

author: Mark Helprin
quote: In an interview, I lose control even of what I am, for it is the interviewer who edits me, finally, into what he thinks I am, and never have I been happy with someone else's version of my life after that person has spent an entire two or three hours fathoming it.

author: Franz Schubert
quote: You believe happiness to be derived from the place in which once you have been happy, but in truth it is centered in ourselves.

author: Lydia Hearst
quote: I truly just want to be happy and continue to work hard; I love life and every opportunity presented.

author: Raveena Tandon
quote: Marriage should never become an adjustment or a compromise. Both the partners should be equally happy and willing to invest their love, care, and respect in the relationship - only then it works.

author: Dennis Prager
quote: As you get older and wiser you realize that when people are given anything without having to earn it (unless they are physically or mentally utterly incapable of earning anything), they become ungrateful and lazy. They also become less happy.

author: Demi Lovato
quote: I learned that you go through things, you deal with them and that's what empowers you and ultimately makes you a happy person.

author: Ogden Nash
quote: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.

author: Suze Orman
quote: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.

author: Bobby Berk
quote: When you're happy at home, it spills out into every other area of your life.

author: Friedrich Schiller
quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.

author: Ben Okri
quote: I lived rough, by my wits, was homeless, lived on the streets, lived on friends' floors, was happy, was miserable.

author: Shahid Kapoor
quote: I don't see any of my colleagues as rivals. I don't think our generation needs to do that. We are a chilled out lot, and we should all be happy.

author: Kim Kardashian
quote: I feel like I'm at a really happy, good space.

author: Alex Scott
quote: My mum never once tried to push me into something different, even though there was no way of making a living out of women's football. She supported me because she saw I was happy and that it gave me a focus to not be hanging around on the street.

author: Sarah Gadon
quote: I'm a really proud, happy Canadian. I think we've got it figured out in our country. For example, gay marriage has just been legalized in all of the U.S. and it's like, 'Wow, hashtag lovewins,' but that's not necessarily a leap forward compared to what we've already experienced in Canada years ago.

author: Paula Cole
quote: Just watching my cats can make me happy.

author: Johnny Weir
quote: I'm going to be a happy housewife. I'm going to be washing boxers and cooking and doing all those sorts of housewife duties. I just want to be happy and proud of every single day.

author: Julia Roberts
quote: Show me a mall, and I'm happy.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about.

author: W. H. Auden
quote: Sob, heavy world Sob as you spin, Mantled in mist Remote from the happy.

author: Arjun Rampal
quote: I look at fitness as a necessity in the same way as how you drink water, eat food, one should look at fitness in a dedicated way. People will look fresh and happy. If you are happy, you in a way look fit.

author: Evelyn Keyes
quote: I was the original Cinderella girl, looking for the happy ending in the fairy story. But my fantasy prince never came.

author: Madison Beer
quote: There will be slow songs, sad songs, happy songs, songs about boys, and songs about being who you are. I'm making sure I'm happy with all of the songs, because if I am not happy with them, I can't expect anyone else to be, you know?

author: Gunnar Peterson
quote: I try to do the right thing. If you do what you know is right, and you're a good person, you might not win short-term all the time, and financial gains might not be there all the time, but ultimately, you can be pretty happy, and you can do some pretty good things in the world. Keep a positive outlook.

author: Avril Lavigne
quote: I'm very comfortable with how I look. I always have been. I think I look pretty good. There's nothing I want to change. I'm pretty happy with what I've got.

author: Janet Jackson
quote: I'm happy with the people that I have around me. And they've been friends of mine since I was young, for a very long time.

author: Alexander Pope
quote: The learned is happy, nature to explore; The fool is happy, that he knows no more.

author: Deepika Padukone
quote: I was born in Copenhagen, and when I was a year old, we moved to Bangalore. I was always a shy person and was happy with just a few friends and that came from my own social awkwardness. I did not know how to make conversations.

author: Magic Johnson
quote: My father is my idol, so I always did everything like him. He used to work two jobs and still come home happy every night.

author: Rebecca Ferguson
quote: Constantly having to think about money is not nice. People used to say, 'Being rich doesn't make you happy'. And I'd think, 'I've got no electricity, nothing - tell that to my empty fridge'.

author: Ira Gershwin
quote: One can be very happy without demanding that others agree with them.

author: Greta Gerwig
quote: I'm not goal-oriented so much as I'm constantly aware of what I'm passionate about, and I'm constantly updating the list. I envision many possible futures for myself where I could be happy, so I just try to keep my passions alive.

author: Ralph Lauren
quote: I think I've been happy because I've been able to do what I believe in, and on my own terms.

author: Alec Berg
quote: My brother is an electrical engineer and went to computer science grad school at Stanford, and he'd tell me stories about the happy hours he'd organize.

author: Rik Mayall
quote: Other people get moody in their forties and fifties - men get the male menopause. I missed the whole thing. I was just really happy.

author: Jeremy Renner
quote: What matters to me is learning and growing, and getting to do what I love to do. As long as I can do that, I'm happy.

author: Peter Singer
quote: I don't eat meat. I've been a vegetarian since 1971. I've gradually become increasingly vegan. I am largely vegan, but I'm a flexible vegan. I don't go to the supermarket and buy non-vegan stuff for myself. But when I'm traveling or going to other people's places, I will be quite happy to eat vegetarian rather than vegan.

author: Sean Murray
quote: My family means everything to me in the world. So as long as my family is taken care of, I'm a happy guy.

author: Vanessa Hudgens
quote: You have a choice whether you want to be happy or not. I choose to be happy.

author: Miranda Hart
quote: I'm not a stereotypically beautiful woman, and I'm so happy that I'm not. I've seen those ladies - the need to be attractive at all times is ghastly. Also, in your twenties, if you are beautiful, everything comes to you, so you never need to develop a personality. I never had that problem.

author: Andra Day
quote: I am happy that I can challenge myself in various fields.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: The secret of being miserable is to have leisure to bother about whether you are happy or not. The cure for it is occupation.

author: Anne-Marie
quote: My aim is to just make people feel good and happy.

author: Vetrimaaran
quote: I wasn't happy the way I completed 'Asuran' or abandoned the film as it isn't complete. People are liking it and it's making money and I'm glad but I'm not happy with how I had to finish it.

author: Bryan White
quote: Christmas makes me happy no matter what time of year it comes around.

author: Roy Ayers
quote: Having good health, being able to breathe and be happy, that's one of the most beautiful gifts. On top of that, I have the gift to play music and make people happy through that. I'm just telling you from my heart, I'm so in love with life.

author: Lauren Wasser
quote: Every time I turn on the TV, it infuriates me. You'll see an ad for Advil or Viagra and hear some monotonous voice warn you about even the smaller side effects like headaches or nausea. When you see a tampon commercial, it's all happy teenage girls running along the beach in bikinis. The dangers are beyond minimized.

author: Karen Salmansohn
quote: I'm a big believer that your life is basically a sum of all the choices you make. The better your choices, the better opportunity to lead a happy life.

author: Daniel Boone
quote: I was happy in the midst of dangers and inconveniences.

author: Martha Beck
quote: If you'd rather live surrounded by pristine objects than by the traces of happy memories, stay focused on tangible things. Otherwise, stop fixating on stuff you can touch and start caring about stuff that touches you.

author: Kapil Sharma
quote: I have received so much love from people. Why will I feel insecure? I am happy.

author: Vin Diesel
quote: You know when something feels so good but you're afraid to feel good about it? So you kinda hold back? Everyone says, Congratulations, you must be so happy. And you say something stupid like, I'm just doing what little I can with what little I have.

author: J. Donald Walters
quote: The secret of happiness is the determination to be happy always, rather than wait for outer circumstances to make one happy.

author: Marion Ross
quote: Happy Days was a wonderful, wonderful experience and I would not have traded it for the world.

author: Robertson Davies
quote: A happy childhood has spoiled many a promising life.

author: B. J. Penn
quote: I live my life my way. I try to do the right thing, but I know there are going to be people who aren't happy with what I do or say no matter what, so I'm not going to worry about it.

author: Shari Arison
quote: I believe we all want the same thing - it doesn't matter who you are or where you're living. We all want to be healthy, happy, to live in peace and prosper. That's what I connect to.

author: Alan Arkin
quote: I don't sense that I am someone's hero, though I'm happy when people like my work. I've learned how to be gracious about it, but I try to let it go by. I've seen how, if people start taking on those accolades, it can ruin them completely.

author: Anne Frank
quote: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: I collect records. And cats. I don't have any cats right now. But if I'm taking a walk and I see a cat, I'm happy.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: I believe in manicures. I believe in overdressing. I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipstick. I believe in pink. I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day, and... I believe in miracles.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quote: If we are peaceful, if we are happy, we can smile, and everyone in our family, our entire society, will benefit from our peace.

author: Akhenaton
quote: Those who gave thee a body, furnished it with weakness; but He who gave thee Soul, armed thee with resolution. Employ it, and thou art wise; be wise and thou art happy.

author: Prince
quote: When everyone recognizes Jehovah's name, then everyone will be happy because everyone will know what to do and how to do it.

author: Bruce Forsyth
quote: Just doing any kind of work - even an interview for breakfast television - makes me feel happy.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Even when we have physical hardships, we can be very happy.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: The world is full of a number of things, I'm sure we should all be as happy as kings.

author: Ileana D'Cruz
quote: I don't think I will ever understand Bollywood. And I'm happy about that because it is a big, crazy, world. It's too complicated and chaotic to understand.

author: Kurt Cobain
quote: I like to make people feel happy and superior in their reaction towards my appearance.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: If selfishness is the key to being miserable, then selflessness must be the key to being happy!

author: Ai Weiwei
quote: We see the tendency in the world to criticise democracy and sometimes even to say that authoritarian countries like China are more efficient. That is very short-sighted. China looks efficient only because it can sacrifice most people's rights. This is not something the west should be happy about.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: Allow children to be happy in their own way, for what better way will they find?

author: Princess Diana
quote: When you are happy you can forgive a great deal.

author: David Rockefeller
quote: I think I am basically a happy person.

author: Freddie Highmore
quote: When you're happy you don't always have to be laughing, and when you're sad you don't have to be crying; sometimes it's the opposite. You laugh when you're the most upset.

author: Jane Fonda
quote: As I started getting older, I realized, 'I'm so happy!' I didn't expect this! I wasn't happy when I was young.

author: John Ridley
quote: Oh, happy day when the enemies of ascendancy have got to confess that people of color rock.

author: Jonathan Agnew
quote: It takes very little effort to make someone happy.

author: Andie MacDowell
quote: I exercise every day. It's what makes me happy.

author: Tabu
quote: I am never embarrassed to relax. I am not part of any rat race. I am very happy to be by myself.

author: Heidi Klum
quote: I am generally a very happy and easygoing person.

author: Logic
quote: Success doesn't make you happy.

author: Umberto Eco
quote: Musical compositions can be very sad - Chopin - but you have the pleasure of this sadness. The cheap consolation is: you will be happy. The higher consolation is the pleasure and recognition of your unhappiness, the pleasure of having recognised that fate, destiny and life are such as they are and so you reach a higher form of consciousness.

author: Winona Ryder
quote: Life's short, so if you're going to spend months doing something, it's gotta be pretty special... But I'm very happy to enter my Baby Jane years, and hopefully segue into the Ruth Gordon years.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: I've realized that being happy is a choice. You never want to rub anybody the wrong way or not be fun to be around, but you have to be happy. When I get logical and I don't trust my instincts - Thats when I get in trouble.

author: Stephen Graham Jones
quote: Making people laugh is so much more difficult than making them sad. Too much fiction defaults to the somber, the tragic. This is because sad endings are easy in comparison - happy endings aren't at all simple to earn, especially when writing to an audience jaded by them.

author: Roberto Cavalli
quote: Today, I'm very happy about myself, because I realized my dreams. I learned how to understand what people want.

author: James Lafferty
quote: My New Year's resolution is to stick to a good workout plan that will keep me healthy and happy.

author: Debbie Reynolds
quote: That's what I love about dance. It makes you happy, fully happy.

author: Christie Brinkley
quote: All I ever wanted was a big, happy family.

author: Colleen Ballinger
quote: I love music, and playing ukulele and singing makes me really happy.

author: Alicia Witt
quote: I was so happy that it filmed in New York not only because it's an amazing city, but also because a lot of people across the world somehow started to think about New York as a dangerous place to be and envisioned it as some war zone after that happened.

author: Albert Camus
quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.

author: Milo Yiannopoulos
quote: What's revolting is the body-positivity movement. What's revolting is this idea now that you can tell women they'll be happy and healthy at any size. Why? Because it tells women that you can be fat, and you can be unattractive, and you can be happy anyway. That's a lie.

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: I don't want to be stinky poo poo girl, I want to be happy flower child.

author: Metta World Peace
quote: I'm just happy that Jesus Christ, um, did not let me lose my teeth when I was 20 years old. 'Cause I was wondering, like, what if you kept your baby teeth until the age of 18 or 20, and then you lose 'em? That would look pretty bad.

author: Ashton Kutcher
quote: I'm happy wherever I go, whatever I do. I'm happy in Iowa, I'm happy here in California.

author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
quote: We are more interested in making others believe we are happy than in trying to be happy ourselves.

author: Manushi Chhillar
quote: I think if you make others happy you are contented.

author: Dave Grohl
quote: When I joined Nirvana, I was the fifth or sixth drummer - I don't know if they'd ever had a drummer they were totally happy with. And they were strangers. There was never much of a deeper connection outside of the music.

author: Claes Bang
quote: I was super happy when I went to Cannes Film Festival - I got a full sponsorship from my favourite Danish brand, Mads Norgaard.

author: Mick Rock
quote: My allegiance was always to the act. I wanted them to be happy. I wasn't owned by a magazine or a record label. And I was a very naughty boy to boot!

author: Jo Brand
quote: I never think, 'Where am I going to be in a year's time?' That seems to be a sure way of missing the fact that you might be quite happy now.

author: Priyanshu Chatterjee
quote: I chucked my CA final exams to pursue modeling. My parents objected to this, but they soon came around. And after seeing my maiden movie Tum Bin, they were happy beyond words!

author: Gretchen Rubin
quote: Happiness is a critical factor for work, and work is a critical factor for happiness. In one of those life-isn't-fair results, it turns out that the happy outperform the less happy. Happy people work more hours each week - and they work more in their free time, too.

author: Maggie Smith
quote: I tend to head for what's amusing because a lot of things aren't happy. But usually you can find a funny side to practically anything.

author: Brian Binnie
quote: If you are not happy when you're weightless, then something's wrong.

author: Eric Church
quote: I am very thankful and blessed to have a healthy and happy baby boy and baby mama.

author: Mason Cooley
quote: A happy arrangement: many people prefer cats to other people, and many cats prefer people to other cats.

author: Demi Lovato
quote: I get mad. I get sad. I have all those emotions. But I just like to keep them to myself. I don't think my fans need to be bothered with if I'm mad or sad about something. I should just be concerned that they are keeping up with my music or I'm making them happy with my show.

author: Chris Kattan
quote: I like light green, sometimes red is fun to look at, not a fan of yellow, unless it's in a rainbow or on a coffee mug or on a happy face.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: Happiness is within the reach of everyone, rich or poor. Yet comparatively few people are happy. I believe the reason for this is that the majority don't recognize happiness even when it is within their grasp.

author: Virginia Postrel
quote: Apple doesn't need to maximize book sales. It simply needs to keep publishers happy enough to maintain an impressive-sounding inventory of titles while waiting for entirely new forms of publishing to develop.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Give a man health and a course to steer, and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not.

author: Christine and the Queens
quote: Festivals are happy places, and you don't really want to enjoy them on your own.

author: Maggie Q
quote: We rarely grow when we're happy, we grow when we hurt.

author: John Cena
quote: What I do for Make-A-Wish is I make children and families that are up against some pretty tough circumstances, I let them come into our WWE universe, and I do my best to make them feel good. I've seen a lot of kids and a lot of families happy, and I think people are going to watch 'American Grit' and have emotional moments.

author: Julie Andrews
quote: And I think as long as a song has beautiful lyrics, I'm so happy.

author: Sabrina Carpenter
quote: The number one priority in life is to take care of yourself and make sure you're happy.

author: Sanjay Dutt
quote: I keep the bad-boy image just to make my fans happy.

author: Columbus Short
quote: I can say with full sincerity that I am happy. I'm happy because I'm doing what I love and I'm not selling out.

author: Adam Driver
quote: Any actor is happy to be involved with something that's challenging, controversial, and not easily palatable. Things that are too dumbed down or easy to swallow are uninteresting... It's good when people have such a polarizing response.

author: Angelo Scola
quote: The destination is a happy life, an accomplished life that doesn't end with death but with eternal life.

author: Eddie Guerrero
quote: I've got to be happy with myself when this ride is over.

author: Joe Calzaghe
quote: I don't seek the limelight. I'm perfectly happy with a quiet life and spending time with my family, but I deserve recognition.

author: Charles Farrar Browne
quote: Let us all be happy, and live within our means, even if we have to borrow the money to do it with.

author: Chico Hamilton
quote: And I'm happy to say that I'm able to find people wherever I go that are not black, not white - they're just human beings. That's where I am, where I've been and where I intend to stay.

author: Philip Glass
quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.

author: Doug Ford
quote: I'd be more than happy to be thrown underneath the bus for my brother any day.

author: Millicent Simmonds
quote: I'm happy being deaf. I'm happy with my life and my family.

author: Kristen Stewart
quote: Success is always something completely different to people. I feel like I've succeeded, if I'm doing something that makes me happy and I'm not lying to anybody.

author: Cynthia Erivo
quote: I discovered at the age of five that I could sing, and I realised people liked it. The sound that came out made people happy, so I kept doing it.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: As your career grows, the list of things that makes you happy should not become smaller, it should become bigger.

author: Willian
quote: I like to smile a lot and I always try to be happy, joking around and stuff.

author: Satoru Iwata
quote: Nintendo's mission is to try to make people happy, to try to make people smile.

author: Will Arnett
quote: When David Cross and I made 'Todd Margaret,' we spent time there. We were shocked and happy with the reaction that we got with fans over there. It was pretty awesome.

author: Ronnie Wood
quote: It's an awful world out there. You've got to make people happy.

author: Anna Nicole Smith
quote: I am just so happy and thrilled and I am so glad Mr. Hefner chose me.

author: Anthony Kiedis
quote: We've just learned how to balance ourselves a little better so that we're happier way more of the time than not, and, you know, being happy is a radical and desirable act if you ask me.

author: Ella Henderson
quote: As long as it's making you happy and you're enjoying it, then you should never stop writing music. Whether it's going to take you somewhere, viewed by other people, or it's literally you in a bedroom at home, it should be something that you do for yourself.

author: Nani
quote: Everyone has a 'Majnu' in them. It's not about the sad or happy climax. It's a term we use to define someone who falls in love and faces problems.

author: Kiku Sharda
quote: My cameo appearance in 'Happy New Year' doesn't mean I am seriously considering a shift to cinema, not at all.

author: Kristin Kreuk
quote: When I was in elementary school, I used to write letters to myself. I'd write letters and go 'Dear Kristen-at-16-years-old, happy birthday. I hope you're doing something.'

author: Taisen Deshimaru
quote: If you are not happy here and now, you never will be.

author: Alexis Bledel
quote: Give me a hot drink, and I'm happy. Hot cider, hot chocolate, coffee... I like all winter beverages!

author: Paige VanZant
quote: I've always been a bubbly and energetic and happy person, but when I get upset, I get frustrated; when someone makes me mad, I definitely have a temper, and I've had to deal with having a temper my whole life.

author: Malaika Arora Khan
quote: For me, the spirit of Christmas means being happy and giving freely. It's a tradition for all the kids in the family to help mom decorate the tree. Christmas is all about family, eating, drinking and making merry.

author: Antonio Conte
quote: Our target is to win, not to try to make all the players happy.

author: Edward Burns
quote: I suffer from Irish-Catholic guilt. Guilt is a good reality check. It keeps that 'do what makes you happy' thing in check.

author: Hill Harper
quote: You deserve a great life. I want to see you become unreasonably happy. And you can. And you will.

author: Fumio Sasaki
quote: Some of you may think that I'm a loser: an unmarried adult with not much money. The old me would have been way too embarrassed to admit all this. I was filled with useless pride. But I honestly don't care about things like that any . The reason is very simple: I'm perfectly happy just as I am.

author: Niecy Nash
quote: The soul of a woman is so important to maintain given all that is on our plates. Figuring out how to do it can be a little tricky. My prayer was, 'Lord, please help me. How can I do it all and not be overwhelmed? How can I do it all and still be happy?' His answer: Find the stolen moments of joy in all you do.

author: David Stern
quote: Everyone knows that if you can keep on making money, everyone's happy.

author: Lina Wertmuller
quote: I love life. I love my friends. I love to eat. Too many things, I love. I am very much an anti-historical character. I am attracted to happy people. Happy people with very grave problems.

author: Julian Casablancas
quote: I'm happy to feed the illusion that I'm a lazy recluse.

author: Christian McCaffrey
quote: Earned success is the key to a positive, happy life.

author: Winnie Byanyima
quote: A good leader, in my view, should have a clear vision of the future they want and the society they need to build. They must also have a connection with the people who work for them and be able to mobilise their best energies to create teams where people can be most creative and happy.

author: Paul Giamatti
quote: Lead roles are fun, but I'm especially happy other, more colorful supporting stuff has come along.

author: Jennifer Winget
quote: Love means being happy, and it is that magical feeling which you get around people you love. Be it friends, family. It could mean different to different people, but to me, it is just being kind and happy with each other.

author: Harry Kane
quote: Money is a bonus of the job, but it doesn't always make you happy.

author: Jessica Lowndes
quote: I love pampering myself, so going for a massage or getting a mani-pedi makes me feel instantly better. When my nails are done I feel so much better - it's the little things that make me so happy, and you literally feel polished.

author: Sonu Sood
quote: Come to think of it, some of the most special films in my career were 'City Of Life' and 'Happy New Year.' For both these films, I stayed over a month in Dubai and just when I was thinking that I need one more film like that, that's when 'Kung Fu Yoga' happened.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Instead of being critical of people in authority over you and envious of their position, be happy you're not responsible for everything they have to do. Instead of piling on complaints, thank them for what they do. Overwhelm them with encouragement and appreciation!

author: Jean-Marc Vallee
quote: I look back, and I've got a couple of films, and I'm happy.

author: M.I.A.
quote: I don't think immigrants are that threatening to society at all. They're just happy they've survived some war somewhere.

author: Alberto Del Rio
quote: I'm really happy with 'WWE '12.' It's amazing. The fact that I'm in a video game is incredible; it's a dream come true.

author: Mark Ruffalo
quote: What is happiness other than a negotiation between reality and your dreams? It's understanding that you give up something for something else. I feel like that's been how I've been trying to be happy, although in my DNA there's more of a depressed person.

author: Mauro Icardi
quote: The unhappy people are those who listen to others. I never listened to anyone, and I'm very happy.

author: Ryan Cabrera
quote: Sometimes the most happy people in life are the ones with nothing. We can't lose sight of the little things in life that should make us the happiest.

author: Joey Chestnut
quote: There's no better feeling than knowing I'm going to break the guy next to me. His body will shut down, and I will keep eating. Then I will look out and see a crowd of happy people.

author: Marc-Andre ter Stegen
quote: I loved scoring goals. I played to score goals. It's what made me happy.

author: Farah Khan
quote: A part of 'Happy New Year' is inspired by western pop culture, the pop music videos of Michael Jackson, Madonna and Duran Duran in the '80s.

author: Justin Bieber
quote: I'm happy with the man I'm becoming.

author: P. V. Sindhu
quote: I love making friends and make others happy. But I also love to be happy all the time. All that aggression that you see remains on the court only.

author: Claudia Winkleman
quote: I'm not sure a pretty and stupid man might be the key to a happy relationship.

author: Robert J. Waldinger
quote: People who are more isolated than they want to be from others find that they are less happy, their health declines earlier in midlife, their brain functioning declines sooner, and they live shorter lives than people who are not lonely.

author: Jerome Boateng
quote: The Ballon d'Or is nice, but at the end of the day, I want to have success and play good, and if people recognise me, then I'm happy.

author: Taylor Kinney
quote: My mum wants me to get married - and have children, of course. She's met Gaga; we've been dating a while. We're in a committed relationship, and I'm really happy in my relationship. I'm a very lucky guy. As far as having more of a domestic life and settling down into my relationship, we have to see what happens.

author: Yanni
quote: I am so happy that I didn't go to school and I didn't have anyone to tell me how to position my fingers on the piano correctly.

author: Tracy McMillan
