quote: Is our desire for partnership just an evolutionary remainder, a Togetherness Delusion, where millions of women only think they need a relationship to be truly happy? Maybe. But you know what? That's fine with me.

author: Toni Collette
quote: People are so fearful about opening themselves up. All you want to do is to be able to connect with other people. When you connect with other people, you connect with something in yourself. It makes you feel happy. And yet it's so scary - it makes people feel vulnerable and unsafe.

author: Daron Malakian
quote: I'm not very happy. I'm frustrated with human beings. I'm the guy who just wants to smack people in the face and say, 'Wake up!'

author: George Stephenson
quote: I am much obliged by the favourable sentiments you express towards me, and shall be happy if I can be of service in carrying into execution your plans.

author: Carlos Vela
quote: When I'm happy good things happen.

author: Sonya Walger
quote: I felt very unstressed on my wedding day. I'm very grateful for that... spending the day on my own, being super quiet and happy and just puttering around doing my own thing.

author: Alfred Schnittke
quote: For almost thirty years I repeatedly saw one and the same dream: I would arrive in Vienna at long last. I would feel really happy, for I was returning to my serene childhood.

author: Juan Mata
quote: I am thrilled to be joining United. I have enjoyed some very happy years at Chelsea, but the time has come for a new challenge.

author: Roy Halladay
quote: I enjoy talking pitching and talking baseball. And I don't have all the answers. I don't claim to, but I'm more than happy to share my beliefs.

author: Rajkumar Hirani
quote: When your first movie releases, in my case it was 'Munnabhai MBBS,' I was just relieved that it was out there. Just that sheer thought makes you happy.

author: Daniel Gilbert
quote: I actually think the same things do make most people happy. The differences are extremely small, and around the margins. You like peach ice cream; I like strawberry ice cream. Both of us like ice cream much better than a smack on the head with two-by-four.

author: Satyajit Ray
quote: For a film maker, an Oscar is like a Nobel Prize, you know. So I am very happy... delighted. There is nothing more after this. I cannot hope to get anything more prestigious.

author: Ree Drummond
quote: I think over-seasoning it is something I tend to do. If it's a good steak, salt, pepper, and butter are the three key ingredients. But just try not to overcook it, and you'll be happy.

author: Naga Chaitanya
quote: I am happy to be acting with my wife.

author: Paige Spiranac
quote: Whenever I'm stressed out or having a bad day, the one thing that gets me happy or back into like a good place of mind is being on the golf course. I love being out there, especially really early in the morning getting the first tee time out and just playing by myself. It's so peaceful.

author: Richard Corliss
quote: You know the fairy-tale drill, especially from the Disney versions: the heroines endure awful stuff in rites of passage that lead to a joyous resolution of, usually, marriage to a prince. 'Into the Woods' follows that template, then asks, 'What happens after Happy Ever After?'

author: Lloyd Blankfein
quote: Mysterious can be cool, if you're in Hollywood and everyone's happy. But it can be really bad if people perceive that the financial interests are adversarial, that there's money versus people. A lot of Goldman Sachs people went into government, so at a time when there's a distrust of institutions, some of that reflects on us.

author: Trip Lee
quote: I think if you were to ask me when I was much younger what my definition of the good life was, I think it would have sounded a lot like what most people would say - a life with all the things you want and everything you think you need to make you happy, and these sorts of things.

author: Andrea Pirlo
quote: If I look in the mirror when I get up or before going to bed at night, I see a man of average ugliness with stubble, an unruly mane of hair, a squint nose, slightly protruding ears, and bags under my eyes. But I also see a man who's completely happy with the figure staring back at him.

author: Anna Torv
quote: Some people just aren't meant to be happy.

author: Laura Wasser
quote: I'm not a divorce monger by any means, but if you're not happy in a relationship, and you've grown apart, it's not healthy for a couple to stay together. It's better for kids to see two happy parents than two miserable parents.

author: Dolores O'Riordan
quote: In 1997, we took time off, and that's when Oasis broke and Princess Diana died and I was home with my baby hating the music industry. People asked what I thought about the Spice Girls, and honestly, I was so happy to tell them I couldn't be bothered to care.

author: Hiroshi Amano
quote: For me, it's my great honour that many people use blue LEDs or LED lightings now. So, we can contribute to the energy savings for the humans, so I'm very, very happy to contribute to the energy saving issues.

author: Andrew Greeley
quote: I have to say that I have no regrets about my decision to become a priest or about the major directions my ministry has taken me... I have been and am happy as a priest, and I have never been lonely... I could have used a bit more solitude.

author: Juan Mata
quote: I'm a person who doesn't think bad about other people or feel happy when other people don't get results.

author: Ryan Potter
quote: I haven't been in the film world long enough to really understand the gravity of 'Big Hero's' success. I'm just happy that it is translating well internationally and that the story and the characters are loved by audiences around the world, and everything that's come after that has been secondary to the initial response.

author: Saul Niguez
quote: Hard things make me happy. You get upset, but you mature and improve: the quicker you reach your best level, the longer you stay there. They say players peak at 28; I wanted to be there at 22, 23.

author: Rush Limbaugh
quote: There are many lessons people can learn about the left. One of the key lessons is they never give anything up. Once they begin a quest, they don't stop until they've got it. The other thing that you need to learn is, they're never happy even after they succeed. They are never happy because there can never be enough to satisfy them.

author: Indya Moore
quote: I want more people to hear me and be part of the change that everyone would benefit from: the change we need so that people like me can be safe and happy.

author: John Starks
quote: Obviously dunking on Horace Grant and Michael, in those circumstances, is just an incredible thing to happen. I'm happy I was able to make that play, and I'm fortunate I was in that position where I could make that happen for my team.

author: AB de Villiers
quote: It's never been about my own runs. If I can score as many as possible to get us into a position to win, then I'll be a very happy man.

author: Logan Paul
quote: Creating content to make people smile and laugh, that's what makes me happy.

author: Tom Bodett
quote: I'm happy to report you still get nothing you don't need at Motel 6, and, therefore, you don't have to pay for it. I don't need valet parking. If I can drive the old crate 300 miles to the hotel all by myself, I can certainly handle the last nine feet to the parking space.

author: Rudy Boesch
quote: I was never destined to be a movie star, and I'm happy not being one.

author: John Oliver
quote: If I wanted to take a more activist or journalistic slant in work, I should probably just go be an activist or a journalist. But I'm happy being a comedian.

author: James Burrows
quote: My father was Abe Burrows, who was a Broadway legend. 'Guys and Dolls,' 'How to Succeed,' 'Cactus Flower,' '40 Karats,' 'Can-Can,' 'Happy Hunting,' 'Reclining Figure,' it goes on. He was a legend, and when I was growing up, I was Abe Burrows' kid. That was my self-esteem.

author: Lil Tracy
quote: I'm just happy to be his son. I don't know, I just feel lucky, really. I feel like I was given a power.

author: Lara Stone
quote: I'm happy people look at me as a role model.

author: Jon Bellion
quote: We're not as happy as our Instagrams and Twitters make us out to be.

author: Dan Castellaneta
quote: Go ahead and play the blues if it'll make you happy.

author: Jubin Nautiyal
quote: When I started working on the sounds and music of 'Breaking the Rules,' I figured that I am really good at it so I was happy.

author: Shawn Spears
quote: All talent needs is credibility and the freedom to create. That is all. That's what will make the talent happy, that's what makes me happy to this day.

author: Carol Burnett
quote: I very much enjoyed doing 'Law & Order,' playing a killer - that was fun, and they had a family feel around the set, so it was a happy show to do even though the subject matter was quite the opposite.

author: Shaun Ryder
quote: When the Happy Mondays started I was like the dad of the band.

author: Terry McAuliffe
quote: I invested in many companies, and I'm happy this one worked. This is capitalism. You invest in stock, it goes up, it goes down. You know, if you don't like capitalism, you don't like making money with stock, move to Cuba or China.

author: Ryan Paevey
quote: I think what I like best about, and what keeps me coming back to work in the Hallmark world is similar to what keeps viewers coming back... of all of the places to go to make believe in TV, there has to be one that's a safe space, a happy place.

author: Katy Perry
quote: I think people appreciate a songwriter who shows different sides. The whole angst thing is cool, but if that's all you've got, it's just boring. Everything I write, whether it's happy or sad, has a sense of humor to it.

author: Lilly Singh
quote: 'Unicorn Island' is the synonym for my happy place. It's a really beautiful message: that happiness is one of the hardest things you'll ever fight for, but it's the only thing worth fighting for.

author: Jurgen Klopp
quote: Yes, it is one of my ultimate aims - it is the ultimate sense of football: to make the people happy, to let them live some emotions that you usually can't get.

author: Ellie Goulding
quote: I want to be safe in the knowledge that I can tour and play festivals for a long time. The main thing is that I want a good reputation as a live performer. If I have that, I'd be so happy.

author: Homer Hickam
quote: I want to make the conquest of the moon the United States' goal for the 21st century and, through that goal, to make us a great and good and happy country for generations to come.

author: Charles Oliveira
quote: Actually, 2016 wasn't a good year for me, as I didn't get any wins. But I started to feel things would get better when I found out about the pregnancy. I'm very happy, this is a new chapter of my life and I'm sure I'll win and dedicate it to my daughter and my family.

author: Kevin De Bruyne
quote: Money is important, but the most important thing for me is to play football, and then I'm happy. OK, you want to earn a good amount of money to be secure, but if I chose money, I would go to Russia and already have a lot more. I like to play football, and that is it.

author: Goldie Hawn
quote: I noted that people are happy here in India. When I went back home, people had everything in the materialistic sense and were surrounded with abundance, but they were not happy.

author: Alexander Downer
quote: Yes, I don't think I shall ever become Prime Minister. Hard as that is to swallow, I tell you one person who is very happy always to see me say that, and that's my wife.

author: Danny Ings
quote: As long as we're winning, I'm happy.

author: Ileana D'Cruz
quote: I don't think I constantly have to be on a promotional spree or be seen in the newspapers every day or even be part of social parties and film gangs. I'm having my own set of journey, and I am happy with it because I don't want to be like everybody.

author: Aida Turturro
quote: I think people should be proud of the work they do, whatever it is. I have this other arty side that loves creating homes. I can be happy going to the hardware store.

author: Vicky Krieps
quote: When I got pregnant, I knew I wasn't anywhere in my career, that I had not arrived. I was still on my adventure, and so I said to the child in my belly, 'I am so happy for you to come, but you should know I'm still on my way, and you'll have to come with me and be in my rucksack.'

author: Grace Slick
quote: If you were to say to me that I couldn't paint, I would write. If I couldn't write, I would be a set designer. As long as I'm creating something, I'm happy.

author: Jane Seymour
quote: Being creative is my idea of heaven. I'm just incredibly fortunate that I can do it in artwork. Watercolor is what I started out with. What I love about watercolor is that a lot of happy accidents occur.

author: Leila Janah
quote: A lot of people are happy to give money to charities but are wary of giving through taxes because they feel it doesn't produce any value.

author: Kevin Federline
quote: I'm happy. I don't care what other people say or think. I'm happy. I'm blessed. I'm proud of my life, and that's it. That's all that matters.

author: Marie Osmond
quote: I am happy. I have a wonderful marriage. I was in a not-great second marriage for 20 years, then I fell in love with Steve, my first husband, again, and we remarried. I wore the dress from our first wedding in 1982 - it was tight, but I could get into it.

author: Syd Barrett
quote: A lot of people want to make films and do photography and things, but I'm quite happy doing what I'm doing.

author: Jordi Molla
quote: My label is to play bad guys of Latin origin in American movies. I'm happy with that label. I prefer to play that than to play a city boy. The bad guy is always something very tempting for the audience.

author: Teri Garr
quote: I have worked enough and I am happy to be touring the country speaking about living with MS to give people inspiration and motivation to help themselves.

author: Dolores O'Riordan
quote: I lived in buses. I didn't really have anything else. I didn't feel like a female, and I ended up really kind of isolated. Everybody thinks you're so happy and so wealthy and such a big star, but you're really kind of lonely and don't know how to stop it.

author: Chris Connelly
quote: I've been drawn to sports stories that have an emotional component to it. I'm happy to get a chance to tell a few.

author: Becky Lynch
quote: My life changed completely. It's crazy now. It's kind of gone from striving and wondering and being confused and being lost to just feeling like the most blessed person in the world - just happy to wake up every day, happy to get on a plane every time. Just couldn't be happier with life, really.

author: Joseph Hume
quote: With an open trade in corn and a fixed duty we should have every man in the country fully fed and happy, instead of our present situation in which so much distress exists - distress of our own producing.

author: Nita Ambani
quote: I like to have everything smiley and happy for my husband. Men don't want to see a grumpy face at the end of a hard day.

author: The Iron Sheik
quote: I do 'The Howard Stern,' make me happy. Also I sold out Comedy Store in the Los Angeles for my roast. This way everybody know I make the people laugh and happy. I love it.
